name: Terramia Ristorante
description: A true gem among all those rhinestones in the North End, this rustic but cozy trattoria with stucco walls and beamed ceilings specializes in creative interpretations of Italian classics. Behind Terramia's pane-windowed storefront on Salem Street is a busy 39-seat trattoria decked out in linens, candlelight and paintings of the Italian countryside. Like the cuisine here, the atmosphere is elegant yet understated. Since opening in 1993, Terramia has aimed to convince North End diners that there was always more to Italian food than red sauce. Over the Years, the inventive and beloved restaurant has done a great deal of convincing. You'll find creative interpretations of seasonally-based classics here. But come early because you won't be alone.

name: Carmelina's
description: Intimate Italian dining in the North End. Large open front overlooking all the action on Hanover St, the main street in the North End. Marble tables, brick walls, large Black and White photos of the family in Sicily. This is truly like taking a trip to an Italian restaurant in a little Italian village. The menu offers a combination of the styles of the Chef / Owner's family, and modern inspiration and applications. We are always striving to keep our food fresh, flavorful and true to our culinary traditions.

name: Bostonia Public House
description: Located in the landmark Board of Trade building at the intersection of State and Broad streets; Bostonia Public House celebrates the history and tradition of Boston. The design thoughtfully combines, rustic elements, modern accents and unique finishes that will remind Bostonians of their rich and colorful heritage. Bostonia is a polished and playful venue offering an American menu within a vibrant bar atmosphere. Bostonia Public House is a genuinely alluring gathering spot. Bostonia has two floors offering a range of event possibilities. The upstairs (1880 Room & Board of Trade Room) is the most popular to rent for private events. For cocktail events with up to 180 guests OR 80 seated guests. You can also rent out all of Bostonia (buyout) with a capacity of 420 guests for a cocktail event. Feel free to send us an inquiry via the Bostonia website.

name: Ostra
description: Situated in Boston's vibrant Back Bay neighborhood, One Charles Street South is home to a modern Mediterranean eatery known as Ostra. Led by Chef/Owner Jamie Mammano and Executive Chef Mitchell Randall, our restaurant draws inspiration from the abundant seafood offerings of both local New England waters and the coastal regions of Europe. With a strong emphasis on specialty seafood sourced from the Mediterranean and various parts of the United States, our culinary creations showcase the natural essence and delightful flavors of each dish through their light preparation.

name: Boston Sail Loft
description: "The Best Clam Chowder in Boston" - Boston Magazine Located right on the water in Boston's historic North End, the charmingly rustic Boston Sail Loft has been serving up classic seaside eats to locals and tourists alike since 1984. The family-owned restaurant has become a Boston landmark for its great service, casual waterfront atmosphere, and fresh seafood, and there's one dish that's really put it on the map: their New England clam chowder.

name: Antico Forno
description: Restaurants Around the World: 9. Antico Forno Boston, MA Antico Forno is billed as "The Most Authentic Italian Restaurant," and we're hard pressed to argue. This mainstay in Boston's North End manages a cozy mom-and-pop atmosphere with world-class traditional cuisine. Entrees like Saltimbocca di Pollo and Linguine al Frutti di Mare hearken back to the old country, but Antico Forno is best known for its brick-oven pizzas piled high with house-made Italian sausages and mozzarella. 10BEST Says (#8 Boston Family Friendly) Best Value: Traditional Italian baked in a brick oven sets this Italian restaurant apart. Serving a selection of pastas, entrees and pizzas all cooked to perfection in their famous brick oven at reasonable prices, Antico Forno is a good value. Kid friendly (although lacking a children's menu), Antico Forno serves even the littlest one sin style. Serving some of the best pies around, Antico Forno carries a large selection of toppings as well.

name: Cafe Bonjour
description: Our food is ethically grown, locally sourced, unprocessed/free of artificial preservatives, free of added/refined sugars & organic whenever possible. We use only free-range meat and dairy, wild caught fish, incorporate whole-grains into our dishes & take advantage of nature's seasonal bounty. We source food and product consciously for a sustainable world. We offer gluten-free, vegetarian & plant-based dishes.

name: Sorellina
description: Sorellina, helmed by Chef Owner Jamie Mammano, redefines Italian-Mediterranean cuisine with a contemporary twist. Our restaurant showcases regionally inspired dishes that celebrate the rich culinary heritage of Italy and the Mediterranean. Complementing the delectable fare is an exceptional wine selection, curated with hidden Italian gems that elevate the dining experience. At Sorellina, we pride ourselves not only on our exceptional cuisine but also on our sophisticated service. Our team strives to create a warm and inviting atmosphere, ensuring that every guest feels pampered and well taken care of

name: Ocean Prime
description: Ocean Prime is a nationally acclaimed, dynamic seafood and steakhouse from the award-winning Cameron Mitchell Restaurants. Ocean Prime, located in Boston, MA, delivers an elevated fine dining experience with exceptional ambiance, a chef-curated menu, signature handcrafted cocktails, a Wine Spectator honored wine list and genuine hospitality. Whether you are looking to socialize, talk business, or celebrate, we are ready to help you create a memorable event. Visit our website to book a reservation.

name: Row 34
description: We're Row 34. If we could eat oysters and drink beer for every meal period, we probably would. Professionals Only.

name: The Capital Grille
description: Make it a day to remember. From birthdays and anniversaries to professional milestones, we aim to make every gathering special at The Capital Grille. Open seven days a week, The Capital Grille is best known for our expertly prepared steaks, which are dry aged in house for 18 to 24 days and then hand-cut by our restaurant's on-premise butcher. The Capital Grille's wine list features more than 350 selections, and its floor-to-ceiling wine kiosk regularly houses 3,500 - 5,000 bottles. Reservations are recommended but not required. For more information, please visit our website. We look forward to delighting you.
address: 900 Boylston St Hynes Convention Ctr, Boston, MA 02115

name: La Voile
description: La Voile is an authentic French brasserie, opened in Cannes in 1947. After a few years under a new ownership, it relocated to Boston in 2007.

name: Tresca
description: Tresca is an authentic Italian restaurant featuring hearty multi-regional cuisine with an exceptional wine cellar, offering a wide selection of the finest vintages. Recently named winner of the 'Wine Spectator' award of excellence. Tresca combines the Italian tradition of hospitality with food that comforts and welcomes its guests. The warm fireplaces and outstanding views of Hanover St. enhance every meal. The service is exceptional and the menu remarkable, a true dining experience.

name: Ma Maison
description: Welcome to Master Chef Jacky Robert classic French bistro. Escape to Paris with authentic French food, daily specials and a boutique wine list. Intimate and elegant ambiance combines with professional and friendly service. Bon Appetit!

name: Mistral
description: Located in Boston's trendy South End, Mistral is a culinary destination that transports you to the picturesque charm of Provence. Immerse yourself in an inviting atmosphere adorned with hand-picked pottery and elegant arched windows, evoking both warmth and sophistication. Our talented chefs showcase their passion for French cuisine by creating artful dishes with the freshest seasonal ingredients.

name: The Q
description: Take a culinary tour through Asia at The Q. This restaurant serves a mix of classic Chinese, Japanese and Mongolian hotpot in upscale, hip surrounds that include a cozy lounge. Sift through a vast menu packed with hot pot specials, sushi and savory entrees. A popular neighborhood destination, The Q is a nice pick if you're in the mood for some pan-Asian cuisine. The restaurant's spacious interior plays well to small- and medium-sized groups.
address: 660 Washington St 660 Washington Apartments, Boston, MA 02111

name: North Street Grille
description:
Welcome to the North Street Grille.
Boston's Best Brunch

name: Davio's Northern Italian Steakhouse - Back Bay
description: Boston's only Northern Italian Steakhouse, Davio's offers the finest Italian cuisine featuring the finest seafood & a full range of the best meats available. The perfect stage for Davio's signature Northern Italian steaks, veal chops and handmade pasta creations. Boston, MA is where Davio's was born. And, in essence, re-born. Once on Newbury Street, in Brookline and in Cambridge, Davio's now resides in the Back Bay in Park Square and serves as an elegant oasis from the hustle and bustle just outside our doors. Stop in and have a drink after work in our welcoming lounge or bar area. The white table cloths of our spacious, relaxed dining room serve as the perfect stage for Davio's signature Northern Italian steaks, veal chops and handmade pasta creations. Additional theatrical flair is provided by our lively, open kitchen layout. Attention to detail and attentiveness to your needs is evident in everything we do. At Davio's, it's all about the guest.

name: Parish Cafe & Bar
description: The Parish Cafe opened in November 1992. Its concept is simple, but fabulous! Owner Gordon Wilcox approached Boston's famous chefs and asked them each to create a sandwich for the Parish Cafe menu. Each sandwich is named for the chef and the restaurant they are from. Since our menu items are created by other chefs our standards are extremely high, which shows through in our enormous following.

name: Toscano Beacon Hill
description: Nestled among the antique shops, boutiques and cafes along Beacon Hill's famous Charles Street, Toscano restaurant remains a staple of Boston's oldest neighborhood.

name: Deuxave
description: Co-Owners Brian Piccini & Chef Christopher Coombs are proud of their award winning Restaurant, Deuxave in the Back Bay. The inspiration behind the restaurant's American Nouveau Cuisine is seasonality, with a focus on working with the finest farms and purveyors, sourcing out the freshest, local ingredients and amplifying their magnificence. The cuisine is strongly rooted in the nouvelle techniques of contemporary French cuisine, married with the splendor of American ingredients in a refined, but casual setting. Deuxave's (pronounced doo-ave) name plays homage to its location at the corners of Commonwealth Ave and Massachusetts Ave.

name: Grill 23 & Bar
description: For more than 40 years, Grill 23 & Bar has been New England's premier steak and seafood grill. Grill 23 & Bar is renowned for its prime, all-natural, dry-aged beef, and fresh, creative seafood presentations. Grill 23's menu showcases signature entrees as well as classic favorites. These creatively composed dishes, each reflecting the best ingredients of the region, offer an addition to our a la carte menu. Grill 23 consistently receives the "Best of Boston" steakhouse award from Boston Magazine and the award-winning wine list has achieved The Wine Spectator's prestigious Grand Award since 2017.

name: Abe & Louie's
description: Abe & Louie's sets the standard for the classic American steakhouse, offering unparalleled flavor combinations and undeniably superior service with an air of timeless sophistication.

name: Bricco
description: Bricco's star has been rising steadily since restaurateur Frank DePasquale revamped the menu to feature modern interpretations of regional Italian dishes. Bricco has garnished superlative reviews from food writers in Boston and around the country - Best Guaranteed Meal in the North End and Best Pasta in Boston just two of the most recent accolades. The talented kitchen team creates "boutique" Italian food, so-called because it is unique, personal and created for a select and sophisticated diner. The food is complemented by an enoteca (wine bar) with an exceptional selection of all-Italian wines. Bricco also offers a sophisticated late night scene. The chic and energetic bar serves up great one of a kind cocktails as well as brick oven pizza with gourmet toppings such as prosciutto and fresh mozzarella from Italy in addition with appetizer selections.

name: Maggiano's Little Italy
description: Welcome to Maggiano's Little Italy Boston, located on Columbus Avenue near the Theater District, Boston Common & Park Plaza. Our restaurant is a quick trip from the Freedom Trail & the Boston Tea Party. Our dining room is ideal for family-style dining with our Italian-American cuisine, reminiscent of a Sunday night visit to your grandmother's house -- or as they say in Italy, nonna's casa! These delicious dishes paired with great service, generous portions and a warm atmosphere keep our guests and their families coming back for more.Join us soon! We look forward to hosting your next business or family gathering.

name: The Daily Catch North End
description: The original location founded in 1973 offers a friendly dining atmosphere. With only twenty seats, you are guranteed fast, effecient service and fresh seafood! This will be an experience to remember. The chalkboard menu features all the classic dishes, in addition to weekly specials! Bring a friend and join the fun!

name: Cantina Italiana
description: We have been serving generations of families, locals and tourists in the North End since 1931. People crave the taste of our food. Some say their mouths water just thinking about eating here. That's why when we change even the slightest thing, they let us know it. We're set in our Ways and Proud of It!

name: Legal Sea Foods - Harborside
description: Experience the ultimate in waterfront dining at our flagship Harborside restaurant. Spanning three floors and 20,000 sq ft, it offers classic seafood favorites, patio dining with harbor views, and private event spaces. On the main floor, dine on Boston's best clam chowder, oysters and raw bar, lobster, grilled and fried seafood, as well as steaks, pasta and more!. On a sunny day, enjoy our Harborside patio with direct view of the harbor, the perfect location for a long lunch on a sunny day. The second floor hosts our private events space, where we create memorable events for private parties, corporate functions, or social celebrations. The third-floor rooftop deck, "The Overlook," provides 180-degree views of Boston Harbor, making it the perfect spot to enjoy the best of Boston's seafood, cocktails, and water views from sunrise to sunset.
address: 270 Northern Avenue Liberty Wharf, Boston, MA 02210

name: Legal Sea Foods - Long Wharf
description: The signature dish at Legal Sea Foods - really fresh fish. Enjoy ocean-side dining just steps from the New England Aquarium. Our restaurant couldn't be more convenient to the Financial District, Freedom Trail, Faneuil Hall and waterfront hotels. We think a visit to Boston must include a meal at Legal Sea Foods. Legal Sea Foods has long proven that a consistent, high quality dining experience never goes out of style. With over 40 varieties of fresh fish and shellfish available throughout the year as well as an award-winning wine list, there's no doubt why legions of fans have fallen hook, line and sinker. We've received a boatload of accolades including "Most Popular Boston Restaurant" (Zagat, 2011/2012), "Best Seafood Restaurant" (Improper Bostonian, 2010), "Best Chowder" (Boston Magazine, 2010), "Best Seafood Restaurant" (Boston Phoenix, 2009) and the honor of serving our legendary New England Clam Chowder at every presidential inauguration since 1981.

name: Ruka Restobar
description: Peruvian-Japanese-Chinese food in a sexy dining room that mixes cultural motifs to dramatic effect
address: The Godfrey Hotel The Godfrey Hotel, Boston, MA 02111

detailed_address.street: The Godfrey Hotel, The Godfrey Hotel

name: Sauciety
description: Sauciety is a modern American grill with a culinary twist that builds off of a high-quality regional cuisine, and then focuses on a variety of unique and flavorful sauces, spreads, dips, and chutneys that the guest is able to select from to customize each course of their meal. It's a place where jeans and a polo t-shirt are as appropriate as a sport jacket and slacks, where drinking a bottle of wine is as comfortable as a cold beer, where a quick burger is as enjoyable as a customized dinner for two. Whether you are hosting a quick business meeting, or are in town with the family, Sauciety offers a delcious array of cuisines. Families can enjoy discounted children's menus, saving you money on your local travels to the city.
address: 425 Summer St The Westin Boston Waterfront, Boston, MA 02210-1719

detailed_address.street: 425 Summer St, The Westin Boston Waterfront

name: Saltie Girl
description: Oysters. Seafood. Tins. Lobster. Potato Chips. Beyond curating one of the largest tinned seafood collection in New England, Sidell and McClelland prepare such dishes as fried lobster and waffles with sweet corn butter and spicy maple syrup and French burgundy snails with black garlic butter to name a few. Chowder, bisque, an amazing raw bar, fried whole belly Ipswich clams and lobster rolls by the ounce are on the menu.

name: Joe's American Bar & Grill
description: Joe's on Newbury, located on Boston's historic Newbury Street, offers the comfort food you crave. A staple in the Back Bay for over 35 years, the popular spot serves a New England inspired menu featuring classic dishes and an extensive beverage list. Joe's on Newbury offers brunch, lunch, and dinner with indoor and outdoor seating as well as an enclosed patio, giving diners the feel of being outside all year long. Delivery and take-out options available.

name: Emmets Irish Pub & Restaurant
description: Emmet's Irish Pub and Restaurant located at 6 Beacon Street Boston is one of the most authentic Irish Pubs in Boston, serving authentic Irish food along with Guinness and a large and diverse beer and wine list to choose from to compliment your meal. And, it's a great place for just a night out for drinks or your next Function or Event !

name: Union Oyster House
description: The Union Oyster House, located on the Freedom Trail, near Faneuil Hall, enjoys the unique distinction of being America's oldest restaurant. This Boston fixture, housed in a building dating back to Pre-Revolutionary days, started serving food in 1826 and has continued ever since with the stalls and oyster bar, where Daniel Webster was a constant customer, in their original positions.

name: 75 Chestnut
description: 75 Chestnut - Nestled amidst the brownstones on the charming streets of Beacon Hill.  Features regional American food. Serving our neighborhood for the last 20+ years we are delighted to welcome you to our establishment. We are proud that we can serve our fresh cooked to order foods, specialty crafted drinks and cocktails. Our super friendly staff will make you want to come back again and again. we are the essential Beacon Hill restaurant a must see for residents and visitors alike. Our seafood stew and steak tips have our guests wanting to come back. We serve dinner seven nights a week and we serve brunch and lunch on Saturdays and Sundays.  the stuffed French toast is something you don't want to miss. during the seasons we always feature food and drink specials and special events. some examples are sweet tooth Tuesdays, wine Wednesdays, green Thursdays, Sunday supper. our Ginger bread lunches are iconic so book soon. we will be happy to serve you .

name: Mooo.... Beacon Hill
description: Welcome to Mooo Beacon Hill, a modern steakhouse that blends sophistication with a relaxed atmosphere, all set in the heart of Boston's Beacon Hill. Our warm and inviting decor provides the perfect backdrop for a memorable dining experience, while our full bar and award-winning wine list add to the overall ambiance. Open seven days a week, we recommend making a reservation to secure your table for a truly unforgettable dining experience. Stay connected with us on social media to keep up with the latest news and events.

name: Trattoria Il Panino
description: Traditional casual italian dining

name: Barcelona Wine Bar
description: Barcelona Wine Bar & Restaurant is a warm and welcoming tapas bar inspired by the culture of Spain. The ever-changing menu is focused on clean flavors, seasonal ingredients, specialties from Spain and the Mediterranean, and rustic small plate presentations created by chefs with tremendous talent. Barcelona offers an award-winning selection of wines from Spain and South America-and boasts one of the largest Spanish wine programs in the U.S.

name: Legal Sea Foods - Downtown Crossing
description: Step into the bustling energy of Downtown Crossing at our stylish Legal Sea Foods location. Featuring a modern look with black brick and glowing amber glass, guests can unwind in the lounge, at the large bar, or in the dining room overlooking our open kitchen. Enjoy local favorites, including Boston's best clam chowder, oysters and raw bar, lobster, grilled and fried seafood, as well as steaks, pasta and more! Located near Boston's theater and financial districts, it's ideal for a pre-show dinner / post-performance catch-up or a get together with the team to celebrate a win.

name: OAK Long Bar + Kitchen
description: Welcome to OAK Long Bar + Kitchen, a stunning American brasserie style restaurant located in the heart of Back Bay in Boston. OAK is a bold, inspired dining concept, bringing you hand crafted, specialty cocktails and a farm-to-table menu featuring locally sourced ingredients.

name: Bleacher Bar
description: Lying beneath the bleachers in center field of historic Fenway Park, a few feet from Ted Williams Red Seat, is the newest addition to Fenway. A unique bar, where the patrons are treated to not only great food and drink, but an unprecedented baseball experience. With a window that looks directly through centerfield and into the park, it is the only view of its kind. Bleacher Bar is a place where you can not only relax and an enjoy and extraordinary bar experience, but a place where you can feel the very history that is Fenway Park.

name: Cheers On Beacon Hill
description: You've seen the TV Show. You know and love the characters. Now experience the Boston pub that inspired it all - Cheers on Beacon Hill, previously known as the Bull & Finch Pub. This really is the place where everybody knows your name. Just step inside and see why. Founded in 1969 as the Bull & Finch Pub, Cheers Beacon Hill became the original inspiration for the setting of the TV show Cheers. In fact, the year that the Cheers show premiered on television (1982) Boston Magazine chose the Bull & Finch Pub as the "Best Neighborhood Bar" in Boston. We're still an intimate neighborhood bar - our neighborhood has just gotten a little bigger! So how did a Boston pub become the inspiration for Cheers? When the producers of the TV show went looking for a location to depict the ideal American bar, they headed to Boston, famous for colorful pubs, sports teams, and lively politics.

name: The Oceanaire Seafood Room
description: The Oceanaire Seafood Room Boston offers a unique dining experience located in an architectural style building that boasts stylish and elegant ambiance for seafood lovers and those looking for sophisticated and upscale dining. The menu showcases an array of seafood dishes, ranging from classic seafood preparations to innovative seafood-focused cuisine crafted by our Executive Chefs. At the heart of our philosophy lies a focus on fresh, sustainable seafood, sourced from the world's finest purveyors, and presented in creative and delicious ways. The expert staff provides guests with knowledgeable and professional service, ensuring that every dining experience is memorable.

name: The Black Rose
description: The Black Rose has been serving up live music, perfect pints of Guinness and traditional Irish fare 365 days a year since 1976. It's a beloved Boston institution, located just steps from historic Faneuil Hall.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House
description: Ruth's Chris Steak House specializes in serving USDA Prime steaks, each seared to perfection, finished with butter and freshly chopped parsley, and served sizzling on a 500-degree plate. We invite you to join us in Boston, MA!
address: 45 School Street Old City Hall, Boston, MA 02108

name: Chart House
description: The pride of Long Wharf, Chart House Boston is renowned for its location and its menu. As Long Wharf's oldest surviving structure, formerly the John Hancock Counting House, the seafood restaurant is a fusion of history and modern style. The newly renovated interior is full of bold colors, a hopping happy hour and the kind of creative seafood dishes that draw a crowd. With an area so full of legendary locales, there's plenty to see and do just a short distance away. Stop by Chart House Boston after a day of boating and shopping around Long Wharf, or enjoy a delicious lunch before an outing to Downtown Boston, Christopher Columbus Waterfront Park and more. See the tall ships that visit our waters or watch the enormous 4th of July celebration on the harbor each year. To get a taste of a true seafood legend and the best Prime Rib Boston has to offer, visit Chart House on Long Wharf!

name: M.J. O'Connor's
description: MJ O'Connor's is a modern Irish pub where you can gather with friends to linger over an inventive menu and late night bites. Grab a seat at our lively bar or relax in our cozy dining room for a modern take on traditional pub dining.

name: Euno
description:
Parties above 7 people are being accepted with special seating arrangements! Please call the restaurant to book your reservation!

Nestled in the heart of Boston's historic North End, Euno is a hidden gem serving only the finest in Italian and Mediterranean cuisine and wines. From exquisite Seafood to Osso Bucco to tender Pollo Parmigian our culinary artists will create a delightful dish to satisfy each and every palate. And if it's a taste of Americana you desire, please enjoy our classic Filet Mignon or world famous Boston Lobster (served in-season only). Voted Most Romantic and highly recommended by celebrity chef Rachael Ray, we are open nightly for dinner at 5pm. Buon Appetito. Enjoy!

If you need to cancel any reservation, please make sure to call the restaurant in advance.

name: Toro Boston
description:
Toro, in Boston, helmed by James Beard Award-winning chef, Ken Oringer, serves delectable Spanish tapas dishes in its contemporary and charming restaurant. The tortilla Espanola with a kale, egg, potato and onion omelet and the Boqueron's white anchovies in vinegar and olive oil make excellent pintxos starters. Some of Toro's most vibrant and delectable tapas plates include the chicken empanada de pollo with charred tomato salsa, the salt cod fritter croquettes de Bacalao with tempura lemon rings and the asado de huesos roasted bone marrow with oxtail marmalade. Equally inventive cocktails, such as the morning star with spicy gin, dark rum, citrus and ginger beer and the tinto de verano with red wine mixed with lemon-lime soda.

Toro's weekend brunch plates include the salchicha y huevos jalapeno maple sausage, fried eggs and crispy potatoes and along with other plates, make it a prime brunch spot.

name: Lucca
description: Lucca has become one of the most talked about restaurants in Boston. Zagat survey named them, Best New Italian Restaurant and they won a coveted Best of Boston award for their elegant and lively bar. They are also the recipient of the Wine Spectator award of excellence with distinction. Whether you join them for a relaxing dining experience or a little later for cocktails and to sample their late night menu, you will be won over by Lucca's elegant charm and warm ambiance.

name: Legal Sea Foods - Logan Airport Terminal B
description: Relax and enjoy a delicious meal or quick bite before your flight at our Logan Airport Terminal B location! We're located post-security, next to gate B8. Enjoy our all-day menu of New England seafood classics or if you're in a rush enjoy Legal to-go before you take off. Please note that our airport locations close 30 minutes prior to the last departing flight, so schedules may vary!
address: 1 Harborside Drive Boston Logan International Airport, Terminal B, Boston, MA 02128

detailed_address.street: 1 Harborside Drive, Boston Logan International Airport, Terminal B

name: Lucia Ristorante
description: Located at the heart of Hanover Street, Lucia Ristorante is an institution in Boston's North End. Opened in 1977, Lucia was the first restaurant to bring authentic Italian cuisine to Boston's oldest neighborhood. We continue to combine traditional Italian favorites with innovative new dishes in our distinctive atmosphere. Ample summertime patio seating is available in the newly bricked courtyard of our neighbor, St. Stephen's Church.
address: 415 Hanover Street North End, Boston, MA 02113

name: Panza Restaurant
description: Panza's traditional Italian cuisine and relaxed atmosphere make for a great evening in this historic North End. For a dinner out with friends or a date night, Panza is the place to go if you want to be treated as part of the family. With signature dishes like Veal Panza, Pescatore and Chicken Parmigiana we pride ourselves on the quality of our ingredients. Throughout the year Panza also offers up seasonal specials to showcase the best of the region. Spend an evening with us and find out why people have made Panza a part of their family.

name: South Street Diner
description: South Street Diner, Boston's ONLY 24-hour full service restaurant. Located in Boston's Leather District, the Diner is currently owned and operated by local restaurateur, Sol Sidell. The Diner has become a local landmark, a constant in Boston's late night or after-hours scene and a final evening destination for local residents, students and visitors. The Diner is the place to grab something to eat, hang out with friends, celebrity watch, and keep the party going. No visit to Boston is complete without a stop at South Street Diner. The Diner was named Best of Boston by Boston Magazine, as well as named for The Best Late Night Food in the U.S.A. by Esquire. Thrillist Media Group named South Street Diner one of the best 24-Hour Diners in the country. Most recently, the Diner's famous Boston Cream Pancakes were featured on the Food Network's "Top 5 Restaurants - Best Late Night Eats."

name: Bistro du Midi
description: With two floors overlooking the Boston Public Gardens, Bistro du Midi is one of the most beloved destinations in the Back Bay of Boston. Offering seasonal al fresco dining and a carefully curated wine list to pair with Executive Chef Partner Robert Sisca's French cuisine inspired by coastal New England influences.

name: The Salty Pig
description: Located in Back Bay/ South End

name: Grotto Restaurant
description: DECADENT CUISINE. SUBTERRANEAN SETTING. Occupying an inconspicuous, subterranean spot on the back side of Beacon Hill, Grotto has earned itself high praise with imaginative, contemporary Italian cuisine. The dining room's exposed brick walls covered with artwork from local creative-types give Grotto an intimate and cozy feel that's hard to find anywhere nearby.

name: Thornton's Restaurant
address: 150 Huntington Ave Across the Prudential Center, Boston, MA 02115-4808

detailed_address.street: 150 Huntington Ave, Across the Prudential Center

name: Wisteria Restaurant & Bar
description: We are located in the Beautiful DoubleTree in downtown Boston. Please use the contact information above to make a reservation. We are looking forward to showing you what we have to offer!

name: Rowes Wharf Sea Grille
description: On weekdays, power breakfasts and lunches are followed by a vibrant after-work cocktail and dinner scene. On weekends, Sea Grille's sunlight-filled dining room or outdoor terrace (seasonally) is the ideal spot along the water for a leisurely lunch or special date night as the sun sets over the harbor.
address: 70 Rowes Wharf 70 Rowes Wharg, Boston, MA 02110

name: Fin Point
description: Fin Point Oyster Bar + Grille features a full Raw Bar and renditions of New England classics that are both sophisticated and approachable. The elegant dining room and dynamic bar scene compliment the inviting atmosphere. An instant classic nestled into historic downtown Boston, perfect for power lunches, afterwork drinks, celebrations and private events.

name: Parker's Restaurant
description: Located inside the Omni Parker House in downtown Boston, Parker's Restaurant is your destination for fine dining in Boston. Our Executive Chef, Gerry Tice celebrates nostalgic cuisine with contemporary flair at the birthplace of Boston Cream Pie, the Parker House Roll and Boston Scrod. Open for breakfast, lunch and dinner.
address: 60 School St Omni Hotel, Boston, MA 02108-4109

name: Eataly Boston
address: 800 Boylston Street Prudential Center, Boston, MA 02199

name: Chickadee
description: Our restaurant features in season New England produce and local ingredients, fusing Mediterranean flavors and recipes.

name: Yard House
description: Yard House is the modern American gathering place where beer and food lovers unite. Known for great food, classic rock, an energetic vibe and endless fleet of tap handles featuring the best craft and local beers, each Yard House location offers 100+ beers on tap along with an array of craft cocktails. Our menu features favorites such as our signature Poke Nachos, street tacos, USDA prime burgers, seafood and steaks. Founded in Long Beach, Calif., in 1996, Yard House now spans across the U.S. with over 80 locations and is open daily for lunch, dinner, happy hour and late-night dining.

name: Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steakhouse
description: Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steakhouse embodies the rich tradition of the classic American steakhouse, serving USDA Prime Beef, fresh seafood and premium wines from our award-winning wine selection.

name: Wahlburgers
address: 132 Brookline Ave Fenway Park Area, Boston, MA 02215-3907

name: Morton's The Steakhouse
description: Enjoy "The Best Steak... Anywhere" at Morton's The Steakhouse, an upscale, fine dining destination offering prime-aged steaks, seafood, happy hour, cocktails, wine dinners, and more. Situated just steps from Boston's World Trade Center, Morton's Boston Seaport restaurant is the perfect setting for a romantic date or business dinner in an elegant private dining room.
address: 2 Seaport Ln 2 Seaport Lane, Boston, MA 02210-2001

name: Barking Crab
description: Barking Crab is a landmark Boston seafood restaurant celebrating our fifteenth season.  Located on the Fort Point Channel in Boston's Seaport District, The Barking Crab features fresh crabs, lobsters, and day-boat fish brought in each morning.  We feature traditional New England fare served in a funky urban clam-shack setting.  We have a full bar including over 15 regional micro brews, cocktails, and an approachable value-priced wine list.  We are family friendly and a short 2 minute walk from the Boston Children's Museum.  Other area attractions include the Institute of Contemporary Art, Harpoon Brewery, the Harbor-walk, Boston Convention and Exhibition Center, and Boston's Financial District.

name: Prezza
description: Prezza has created a menu that is bound to satisfy all your Italian cravings. We are a cut above all the other competitors in the neighborhood. Servicing the Boston, MA Areas.

name: Legal Sea Foods - Copley Place
description: Discover the heart of Boston with a view! Our Copley Place location offers stunning floor-to-ceiling windows showcasing the city's historic South End. Enjoy a meal in our spacious main dining room, relax at the bar, or host an event in our expansive private space on the second floor, just near Saks Fifth Men's Store. Enjoy local favorites, including Boston's best clam chowder, oysters and raw bar, lobster, grilled and fried seafood, as well as steaks, pasta and more! With convenient direct indoor access to the Westin and Marriott hotels, as well as the Prudential Center, Copley Place is the perfect stop for a delicious meal and breathtaking views. Short on time? Grab our Legal classics to-go!
address: Second Floor @ Copley Place Mall, 100 Huntington Avenue Second Floor, Copley Place Mall, Boston, MA 02116

detailed_address.street: Second Floor @ Copley Place Mall, 100 Huntington Avenue, Second Floor, Copley Place Mall

name: Mare Oyster Bar
description: DePasquale Ventures seafood restaurant, offering an Italian style seafood menu, one of the largest selections of oysters in the city, and also an outdoor patio open year round.
address: 3 Mechanic St 223 Hanover St, Boston, MA 02113

name: Trident Booksellers & Cafe
description: Trident Booksellers & Cafe opened in 1984 and since then has expanded from a small bookstore cafe to a full-service restaurant and two floors of books. Located on Newbury Street in historic Back Bay, Trident is the last general independent bookstore in Boston. Browse our bookshelves and shop our eclectic mix of gifts and greeting cards. In the cafe, menu favorites are the lemon ricotta French toast, vegan cashew chili, and deluxe grilled cheese. We also have a full espresso bar, a large selection of loose leaf teas, beer & wine, and fresh juices and smoothies. And, don't miss our in-house events! Author talks, creative workshops (paint and plant nights), Friday night trivia, cooking demos, and other events are held in the upstairs cafe.

name: Democracy Brewing
description: We are Democracy Brewing, a worker-owned brewery and restaurant committed to making great beers and supporting our community. We opened our doors at 35 Temple Place on July 4th, Independence Day 2018! Our mission is to re-create the traditional public house, brew the best beer in Boston, pair it with tasty food, and serve it to you in combination with two great American ideals: democracy, and owning your own business. Democracy Brewing is a meeting place with the atmosphere and camaraderie of your local neighborhood pub mixed with an old world beer hall. Our tasting room has a full scratch kitchen and an event space to host community events, organizational fundraisers, cultural events, live music and much more. We also offer take-away 32oz crowlers and distribute kegs, so keep an eye out for us at your favorite bar or restaurant!

name: Select Oyster Bar
description: Select Oyster Bar features local oysters and the rest of the menu offers crudo, ceviche, local shellfish, spanish octopus & more. The kitchen showcases the top quality seafood with simple seasonal preparations. Our wine program focuses on seafood centric wines and our bar serves up cocktails with small batch artisanal spirits. Select opened in April 2015 in a Back Bay townhouse serving modern seafood and taking inspiration from the neo-bistro movement in Paris. The restaurant quickly garnered praise including Boston Magazine's Best of Boston Best New Restaurant 2015 and Best Wine Program 2016, Improper Bostonian's Boston's Best Seafood 2015 & 2016, Food & Wine's Best New Wine Bars in America 2016, among others.

name: Committee
description: Create a high-energy yet intimate dining destination by Boston's waterfront. Set a modern vibe with steel, reclaimed wood and a gleaming center bar. Add hand-crafted cocktails and farm-fresh ingredients into the mix. And you've got Committee--a dining spot that brings contemporary Greek flavor to the Fan Pier area. Committee draws inspiration from the modern day "ouzeri," a casual cafe that can be found throughout Greece. It's the kind of welcoming place where people get together to talk, relax, and bond over a fresh-made meal. Greeks know that delicious food sets the stage for a great meeting--whether you're discussing a business deal or simply catching up with old friends. Committee, conceived by a Greek chef, embraces this tradition. Committee veers from the expected by designing its menu around "Meze"--a culinary concept that encourages people to sample and share. Our creative chefs prepare small sharable plates that are brought to the table throughout the meal.

name: Granary Tavern
description: Granary Tavern, located at the end of Milk Street is a 250-seat restaurant boasting two stunning floors and two bars accented by exposed brick and beams and a warm design that makes it the perfect gathering spot for food, drinks, and fun. Open for lunch through to late night, and brunch on weekends.

name: Douzo
description: When diners enter this stylish restaurant in the heart of Boston's Back Bay - steps away from the South End & Theater District - they are immediately enveloped in earth tones, rich dark wood and the airiness of high ceilings reverberating with the energy and excitement of the space. The lively bar area is a popular gathering spot offering a selection of cocktails, sake, wine and beer. Guests look on as the team of chefs create cutting-edge sushi dishes, or they settle into an experience of award-winning cuisine in the main dining area. From the knowledgeable and attentive waitstaff to charismatic owner Jack Huang's pleasure at meeting diners, expect the comfort of being warmly welcomed at Douzo. Like the atmosphere, Douzo's healthy and fresh cuisine seamlessly combines warm tradition and modern innovation of Japanese classics. Douzo offers inventive dishes that make the restaurant both a neighborhood fixture and a critically acclaimed destination, signature items.

name: The Dubliner Irish Pub Boston
description: The Dubliner Boston Brings authentic Irish cuisine and style bar to Boston. Boasting a massive whiskey collection of some of rarest in Irish whiskey & a delicious food menu curated by donegal born head chef McGee. The dubliner offers live sports & live music 7 days a week in the heart of downtown Boston

name: Arya Trattoria
description: Old World Italian meets modern sophistication. Our connection to this restaurant dates back to when Chef/Owner Massimo was the bread boy at the late Scalinatella restaurant. To further add to the synchronicity of this location, Massimo's baptism reception was also held in this exact locaton some 30 years ago at the old 'il sole' restaurant. Please join the Tiberi family and experience a dream come true.

name: Tasty Burger
description: With five locations in the Boston area, Tasty Burger is a modern American neighborhood burger restaurant. Outstanding fresh ingredients are cooked to order in an incredibly fun, laid back atmosphere that has made 'Tasty' an instant classic. Our burgers come from grass-fed steer raised on family farms; are served alongside shakes, rings, fries, beer & wine; and surrounded by local artists' work, free pool & foosball, and a digital jukebox with great music. Tasty Burger is the Official Burger of the Boston Calling Music Festival.

name: Ned Devine's
description: Irish pub fun in Faneuil Hall starts with a visit to Ned Devine's - a favorite for visitors and locals alike for over 10 years. Stop in for a pint of Guinness and award winning Clam Chowder. The Ned Devine's menu includes American and Irish pub favorites to pair with local craft and bottled beers. A spacious seasonal patio is available for dining from Spring until Fall.
address: 1 Faneuil Hall Faneuil Hall Marketplace, Boston, MA 2109

name: The Courtyard Tea Room
description: Overlooking the beautiful Italianate courtyard in the Boston Public Library's historic McKim Building, The Courtyard Tea Room is steeped in history and offers a delightful Afternoon Tea Service. Indulging in beautifully presented homemade pastries, a fine selection of loose leaf teas, and elevated tea sandwiches, The Courtyard Tea Room is a must when visiting Copley Square. The tea room is open weekly from Tuesday through Sunday, 11:30-5:00 pm, with the last seating occurring at 3:00 pm.
address: 700 Boylston St Boston Public Library, Boston, MA 02116-2813

name: Smith & Wollensky - Boston
description: Steeped in history with breathtaking views of Boston Harbor. Join us for a classic steakhouse experience with modern flair. Perfect for business or personal occasions with five newly renovated dining rooms, outdoor patio, and bar areas.
address: 294 Congress St Atlantic Wharf, Boston, MA 02210

name: The Smoke Shop BBQ - Seaport
description: The Smoke Shop is a chef-owned passion project and culmination of over two decades of practice, planning and competition-style barbecue from World Champion Pitmaster and Author, Chef Andy Husbands. The menu showcases slow-cooked, 1st place Brisket & Ribs, Burnt Ends, Texas Hot Links and more. Sides include everything from Sweet and Spicy Coleslaw and Collard Greens to The Cornbread with Honey Sea-Salt Butter. The Smoke Shop also boasts a 200+ American Whiskey selection and features elevated takes on classic cocktails. Our craft beer list is a compilation of your favorite local breweries mixed in with some of New England's hidden gems. Combine all that with family-style hospitality and The Smoke Shop will transport you to your favorite memories of barbecues gone before.

name: Oishii Boston
description: Oishii Boston is located in the South End SOWA district, the most artistic area in Boston. Since 2006 we have been devoted to providing each guest with a memorable dining experience. Our dedicated and knowledgeable staff will help guide you through your culinary journey. Chef Ting San and his team are committed to using their creativity, to transform the freshest ingredients into works of art. We offer craft cocktails, rare Japanese whisky and an extensive sake and wine collection. Whether you're looking for a quick bite at our lively sushi bar, grabbing a cocktail in our contemporary Tokyo-style lounge, or trying one of our Omakase offerings at a romantic table next to our waterfall, we look forward to offering a unique experience to each guest.

name: Krasi
description: Krasi is love. Krasi is life. Krasi is wine, literally. Krasi is about conversations and the people immersed in them. It's about new friends, old friends, and turning strangers into friends. Krasi is Greek, differently.

name: O Ya
description: [Per government mandates from Massachusetts and New York, as of Monday 3/16 we need to temporarily close all restaurants until April 6th in Boston, and indefinitely in NYC. As soon as we are able to re-open we will let our guests know. We wish you health through these incredibly trying times and we so look forward to seeing each other again soon.]

name: Mo'Rockin Fusion
description: Morad's love for cooking stems from his childhood growing up in Morocco and helping his mother out in the kitchen. He moved to the U.S. in his 20s and worked at a number of fine dining restaurants in Atlantic City and Boston, but he always wanted to have a business of his own. He knew that the kind of food he liked to cook was unique (and delicious), so he decided to test the market by opening a food truck, and now new location at Boston Public Market.

name: Scampo
description: The stunning first floor restaurant in Boston's Liberty Hotel, Scampo, is a culinary destination created by legendary chef Lydia Shire and The Lyons Group in April of 2008. In Scampo, Shire's reputation for defying tradition translates into Italian-inspired cuisine unrestrained by borders, drawing on flavors from the Mediterranean and Middle East. Scampo is a reflection of Chef Shire: bold, red and full of energy. The contemporary space features shiny copper lanterns, a glowing orange bar and seating overlooking the mozzarella bar.
address: 215 Charles St Liberty Hotel, Boston, MA 02114-3001

name: Mooncusser
description: Mooncusser Fish House is an elegant New England Fish House serving local fishes alongside sustainable alternatives. A wine list of 400 selections and gracious service complement the cuisine.

name: Longwood Grille & Bar
description: Boston's best burgers and chicken wings, an array of contemporary American dishes and a selection of special regional favorites - all of this and much more is available at the Longwood Grille and Bar. Our 100% smoke-free restaurant is perfect for dining with the entire family, catching the big game over a microbrew, or settling in for an evening of seafood fresh from the Atlantic Ocean. Located onsite at The Inn at Longwood Medical, Longwood Grille + Bar provides a number of heart-healthy and gluten-free items, along with a full kids' menu and seasonal specials crafted to suit the mood of each month.
address: 342 Longwood Ave Entrance is located in the Longwood Galleria, Boston, MA 02115-5745

detailed_address.street: 342 Longwood Ave, Entrance is located in the Longwood Galleria

name: Fogo de Chao Brazilian Steakhouse
description: Fogo de Chao is an internationally-renowned steakhouse from Brazil that allows guests to discover what's next at every turn. Founded in Southern Brazil in 1979, Fogo elevates the centuries-old culinary art of churrasco - roasting high-quality cuts of meat over an open flame - into a cultural dining experience of discovery. Please join us in our dining room, in our more casual Bar Fogo, or bring the Fogo Experience to you with Fogo To-Go or Catering. Visit our website to make a reservation or place an order.

name: Sonsie
description: Sonsie celebrates twenty-four years on Boston's famous Newbury Street serving top-notch International cuisine from award-winning Chef Jason Hanelt. Sonsie boasts beautiful French doors that translate to an open sidewalk cafe in season, as well as a European lounge with deep leather chairs and sofas. The mahogany bar serves the best martinis in town from an experienced and friendly bartenders, and the brick-oven churns out pizzas throughout the day. It is easy to relax at Sonsie and enjoy the music that reflects the ambience of the restaurant as day progresses into night. Chef Hanelt's menu always introduces fresh flavors and brilliant food combinations. Signature dishes dot the menu as well as seasonal dishes splashed with nightly specials. Reservations are recommended and private parties are welcome For private gatherings, reserve our esteemed Wine Room: an elegant old world setting blended with modern design and featuring a walk-in, temperature --controlled glass wine cellar.

name: State Street Provisions
description: A welcoming contemporary restaurant with a touch of rustic charm, State Street Provisions is today's answer to the taverns that once offered respite to the fishermen and tradesmen who worked in Boston's bustling Long Wharf. Historically inspired but forward thinking food and drink menus feature fresh ingredients from near and far, while the comfortable space meets the needs and passing fancies of residents, workers and visitors alike. State Street Provisions is located at the intersection of State Street and Atlantic Avenue on Long Wharf, one of Boston's most storied landmarks. Breaking ground in 1710, the Wharf was a vibrant hub for the Colonial U.S. shipping industry and originally extended nearly half a mile from the shoreline at Faneuil Hall.

name: Amrheins Restaurant
description: Amrheins has been a Boston tradition since 1890. For over a century, diners throughout the city of Boston have been welcomed into Amrheins to enjoy quality meals amongst friends and neighbors. Today that tradition continues in our updated facility. Despite the renovations in 2005, Amrheins is still full of history. Amrheins is the proud home of the oldest hand carved bar in America and still has the first Draft Beer pump in Boston on display. But what really makes Amrheins special is its dedication to quality cuisine and superior service. We hope that you join us again soon.

name: Moonshine 152
description: A modern -American, neighborhood bistro restaurant in Southie (South Boston) by Chef-owner Asia Mei (as seen on Chopped, Beat Bobby Flay & Phantom Gourmet). With a globally-inspired, comfort food meets street food menu, Chef Asia puts her unique spin on both East & West Coast style cooking, striving to match the beautiful restaurant's aesthetic, contributing to numerous glowing re-reviews, accolades & praise. Her "Best of Boston" Buttermilk Fried Chicken Wings, her award-winning Burgers & Vegetarian Burgers, Street Tacos & weekly changing specials are only some of the reasons she was awarded the 2023 Best of Boston Neighborhood Restaurant in South Boston. Moonshine 152 is located at 152 Dorchester Avenue, on the corner of Dorchester Avenue & West 4th Street in South Boston. We are one block from the Broadway Red Line train station, with bus connections local bus connections. We are a short walk from the South End & Ink Block neighborhoods as well as The Seaport & Downtown Boston.

name: Rock Bottom Restaurant & Brewery
description: Rock Bottom Restaurant & Brewery is a welcoming and engaging craft beer experience with a variety of unique craft beer freshly brewed on-site to pair with our popular American crave-able food like our Brewery Nachos and Ballpark Pretzel, as well as comforting dishes like Bacon Chicken Mac n' Cheese, Fish and Chips and Bacon Cheddar Burger. Each of our 28 locations has a local brewer and friendly staff that work to connect with guests over stories, inspiration and love of craft beer in a casual and comfortable atmosphere.

name: Shojo Restaurant
description: Shojo is a trendy Asian fusion spot in Boston's Chinatown, offering a fresh take on modern Asian cuisine with a seasonally changing menu of shareable plates. The vibrant atmosphere features exposed brick, colorful murals, and hip-hop beats, making it the perfect spot for a fun dining experience. The bar serves a variety of Japanese whisky, craft and tiki-inspired cocktails to complement your meal or enjoy a night out. The menu blends flavors from Japan, Korea, Thailand, and beyond, with dishes like the Shojonator bao burger (Boston Magazine Best Burger Winner), Shadowless Duck Fat Fries, and Wagyu Dumplings. Whether for a casual lunch, lively dinner, or late-night hangout, Shojo offers delicious food and a memorable vibe.

name: The Haven
description: Welcome to New England's first and only Scottish Restaurant. Food made from scratch and with love. We are the place to come for your Scotch Egg fix, Scottish Salmon, Haggis neeps and tatties or even a Deep Fried Mars Bar. We offer over 30 Scottish Craft Beers, unique Cocktails, Scottish music and a great Brunch, Lunch, Dinner and Late Night scene. With numerous accolades from Best local Bar to Buzzfeed's Best Burger in USA (!) we are truly worth a visit while in Boston. Right round the corner from Sam Adams Brewery in the heart of JP next to the Orange Line.
address: 284 Amory St JPNDC Brewery Complex, Boston, MA 02130

name: Alma Gaucha Prime Brazilian Steakhouse
description: Experience a restaurant with the authentic taste of a Brazilian Steakhouse at Alma Gaucha, near the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center - BCEC in the heart of the Seaport. Indulge in our all-you-can-eat rodizio, featuring prime cuts like Picanha, Ribeye, Lamb Chops and Filet Mignon, grilled to perfection Gaucho style. Our endless meat skewers and Brazilian grill dishes offer a dining experience unlike any other. Perfect for meat lovers, business dining and special celebrations, we bring the flavors of Brazilian cuisine to Boston's vibrant food at lunch or dinner time!
address: 401 D St inside Aloft Hotel, Seaport, Boston, MA 02210

detailed_address.street: 401 D St, inside Aloft Hotel, Seaport

name: Mida
description: MIDA is a South End neighborhood restaurant, inspired by the simplicity of classic Italian dishes . Our menu focuses on many regions of traditional Italian food and culture, using fresh, seasonal ingredients. Reservations are accepted nightly starting at 5:00 PM, with a portion of our dining room held for walk-ins. For parties larger than four guests or if you do not see your reservation time listed, please contact the restaurant directly for assistance.

name: The Capital Burger
description: The Capital Burger is your destination for the ultimate burger indulgence, operating seven days a week. With a focus on quality, we offer specialty and classic burgers meticulously crafted from our proprietary beef blend, promising unparalleled flavor and juiciness. Served on brioche buns with perfectly crispy sea salt fries, our burgers are accompanied by an impressive selection of handcrafted cocktails like the Smoked Bacon Old Fashioned and a variety of local beers and acclaimed wines.

name: Aquitaine
description: Aquitaine, an award-winning French bistro in Boston's South End, has been a neighborhood gem for over 20 years. Whether you're seeking a romantic dinner, a charming date night, or a sophisticated business lunch, Aquitaine delivers an authentic Parisian experience. Savor French favorites like Steak Frites, Nicoise Salad, Moules (Mussels), Duck Confit, Croque Madame, and Truffle Fries in the recently renovated dining room or on the expanded patio. Known as a wine bar destination, Aquitaine also offers an iconic brunch for those who want to indulge in classic French dishes while overlooking the vibrant Tremont Street.

name: Isabella's Ristorante
description: We are open every day,on freedom trail,next to Paul Revere house.
address: 2 Prince St North End, Boston, MA 02113-2409

name: Typhoon Asian Bistro
description: Welcome to Typhoon. Situated in the heart of Boston's historic back bay neighborhood on Boylston Street since July 2000, Typhoon Asian Bistro offers a modern Japanese cuisine made only from the freshest ingredients and the finest cuts for a taste of perfection. The menu highlights gourmet sushi, innovative makimono, nigiri, sashimi, Hawaiian poke, Asian street food-inspired entrees, small plates and bar bites, alongside craft exotic cocktails with fresh fruits, homemade syrups and an extensive wine list, including a wide range of sake collection. From intimate dinners to group dining, Typhoon Asian Bistro is a truly delightful culinary experience.

name: Strega Italiano Seaport
description: Located at Fan Pier in Boston's beautiful Seaport District, Strega Italiano Seaport is certainly Boston's foremost dining destination, with oceanfront views of the Boston Harbor, dazzling interiors and an expansive patio making for the perfect ambience.

name: FiRE+iCE
description: Located walking distance from Newbury Street, the Boston Public Library, and the Freedom Trail - FiRE+iCE Boston is the perfect place for that can't-miss, wicked awesome, iconic, Boston experience. Wondering what we are all about? We are best known for our legendary (yes we said it, legendary) round grill that allows you to enjoy a dish of your own creation - we like to think of it as "choose your own adventure dining." Craving some Mexican food? We've got that. Oh, and Italian? We've got that too. Trust us, we've got a little bit of something for everyone in your party. It doesn't matter if you're a local, tourist, or a frequent visitor of our restaurant; we welcome you to FiRE+iCE Boston with open arms and a guaranteed good time.
address: 205 Berkeley Street Park Square Building Office, Boston, MA 02116

detailed_address.street: 205 Berkeley Street, Park Square Building Office

name: Time Out Market Boston
description: With 15 kitchens and 2 bars under one roof, Time Out Market Boston showcases the best of Boston's food and beverage scene.

name: Salty Dog Seafood Grille & Bar
description: Salty Dog Seafood Grille & Bar in Boston, MA specializes in Fresh New England Seafood prepared traditionally with local ingredients. We offer the Freshest and most delicious local oysters and clams on the halfshell shucked to order at our sit down raw bars. All our fish arrives fresh daily, all our sauces are house recipes, all our dishes are made to order. The atmosphere is friendly and casual. Our walk-down dining rooms are great for a private business lunch or a couples night out. The downstairs bar is the perfect stop after work to wait out the traffic and grab some oysters on the halfshell or quick appetizers. In the summer, the outside cafe with our street side bar is the ultimate place to take in Boston and relax with a great meal on the historic bricks of Faneuil Hall Marketplace. For the freshest seafood in Boston, MA come to Salty Dog Seafood Grille & Bar.
address: 206 Faneuil Hall Market Pl, Boston, MA 02109-1634

name: sweetgreen
description: Fresh salads, plates + grain bowls available for pickup and delivery every day, made in-house from scratch, using whole produce delivered that morning.

name: Pressed Cafe
description: Pressed Cafe offers an extensive all-day fast-casual menu designed with a Mediterranean flair and the freshest local ingredients. Whether you're grabbing a post-workout juice, meeting a friend for lunch, or capping off your week with one of our signature cocktails, Pressed Cafe delivers a sophisticated worldly experience like no other - and we do it all with exceptional & fast service.

name: Davio's Northern Italian Steakhouse
description: Davio's is an upscale restaurant beginning in Boston and features regional Northern Italian cuisine with a focus on the grill. Chef/Owner Steve DiFillippo takes pride in hospitality and has been a mainstay in Boston & beyond for over 30 years. Davio's features an extensive wine list & menu items that range from Prime steaks to handmade pasta creations using the finest ingredients.
address: 26 Fan Pier Blvd 50 Liberty Dr., Boston, MA 02210-2145

name: Buttermilk & Bourbon
description: Takeout and delivery services are available via our website and Uber Eats. There are three options for seating: Standard (Indoors), High-Top (Indoors), and Outdoors. If one of these options does not appear, it is because we are currently booked for that type of seating during the date and time you are seeking. We offer a fifteen-minute grace period and ask that you call us if you will be running late or your reservation may be canceled. We allow an hour and a half for a reservation of 2 guests and 2 hours for reservations consisting of 3 or more guests. All outdoor patio reservations are subject to being canceled in the event of inclement weather. We look forward to seeing you soon!

name: Mastro's Ocean Club
description: Mastro's collection of sophisticated, classic Steakhouses and Ocean Club seafood locations are recognized for their combination of world-class service, highly acclaimed cuisine, and live entertainment in an elegant yet energetic atmosphere. A truly unparalleled dining experience.
address: 25 Fan Pier Blvd At 22 Liberty, Boston, MA 02210

name: Ristorante Saraceno
description: Born out of our love of fine wines and traditional food, Ristorante Saraceno Italian/Napoletana style cuisine has become the premiere location for fine dining in Boston's Historic North End. After traveling the Italian regions and sampling different cuisines, we decided to make our way back home and bring Napoli's best to Boston. Our biggest challenge was finding the right, high-quality ingredients for the dishes we wanted to serve. We are dedicated to offering only the finest and freshest foods. We have also taken great care in assembling a team of only the best chefs and experienced kitchen and dining staff. Come and taste the experience yourself.

name: GreCo
description: GRECO is the neighborhood we grew up in, the stories we heard while growing up, the people we loved. GRECO is a trip and we travel along with it. And in that trip we carry our recipes and share all the smells and tastes of home. GRECO is our "meraki", it's our need to remember and create. And there's one way and one way only to do that. Our TRULY GREEK way.

name: Florentine Cafe Bar & Bistro
description: The Florentine Cafe is an Italian lunch and dinner cafe, with a full bar, draft beers, and a great wine selection. Stop by with a friend for drinks and a meal or come to lunch with business colleagues. We now offer outdoor seating, as well as, indoor seating with a great view. When the floor-to-ceiling windows open, they let in a nice breeze, allowing the fresh air to circulate, adding to a beautiful dining experience, in, or out. We also have a separate dining area downstairs that seats up to 50 guests It's perfect for any private event, rehearsal dinner, or business function. The casual atmosphere makes it easy to relax, and enjoy a meal with fine company. Join us, start with complimentary, home-made Focaccia bread and seasoned olive oil, and you must try our signature dish, Ravioli di Aragosta. Other best dishes include, the Fusilli Alla Vodka, Pollo al Limone, and a new favourite, the Salmone D'estate.

name: Basile - Fine Italian Kitchen
description: "This is the best Italian fine dining in BOSTON" - Zagat. Famous for its authentic Italian food, which is complimented with great wine selection, excellent service and sophisticated ambiance.
address: 162 Columbus Ave Back Bay, Boston, MA 02116-5235

name: Pastoral
description: Pastoral is a home, a restaurant, and a community and a dream. Dedicated to food and its direct connection to celebration, community, and culture. Providing one of the few human experiences we all have in common. Eating. Sharing at the table, we can open up our senses and our consciences to our place in the world, along with the place of our neighbors. Pastoral runs on a system of organic processes. Built on a foundation of relationships with our community of friends and teachers, hunters and farmers, importers and foragers, wine & beer makers, fishermen, builders, artists, we work to celebrate food and the daily nourishment it provides.
address: 345 Congress Street, Fort Point, Boston, MA 02210-1222

name: South End Buttery
description: South End Buttery is a neighborhood eat-in and take-away bakery/cafe by day and full bar/restaurant by night. The Buttery's award-winning food has a reputation for combining seasonal, local ingredients to create exceptional everyday food at everyday prices. The Buttery takes casual fine dining to new heights, with classic comfort food as well as dishes for the health and calorie conscious that pair beautifully with the affordable wine and beer selections. You'll feel like you're dining in your own home - but you won't have to do the dishes!

name: Boston Chops
description: Boston Chops Downtown is a casual, yet refined twist on the classic American steakhouse. Impeccable service and top quality nose-to-tail dining combine in a modern, urban atmosphere.

name: Bono Restaurant and Catering
description: Previously known as "La Casa del Pandebono," we've undergone a fantastic transformation, and we're thrilled to introduce our new identity: "Bono" Restaurant and Catering! Bono Restaurant and Catering takes pride in offering an enticing array of Latin dishes that will delight your taste buds! From savory classics like mouthwatering tacos, flavorful empanadas, and sizzling quesadillas, to delightful desserts like churros and tres leches cake, we've got your cravings covered. But that's not all! We've expanded our offerings to include an exciting bar experience. Join us at our tapas bar for a delightful selection of small plates and shareable bites. Enjoy our vibrant happy hour with great cold beer, expertly crafted cocktails, and refreshing wine. Whether you're looking for a casual evening out or a special celebration, our bar is the perfect spot to unwind and indulge. We also offer top-notch catering services, perfect for your special occasions. Whether it's a family gathering, corp
address: 271 Meridian St East Boston, Boston, MA 02128

name: The Stockyard Restaurant
description: The Stockyard is a classic American Steakhouse that has served quality food and drinks to the greater Boston Area for over 40 years. Located just outside the city, this historical restaurant has served as a Boston landmark, viewable from the Mass Pike. A 150 car parking lot, multiple private function venues, and 200-seated dining area makes the Stockyard a Boston rarity. When you walk in, we can guarantee you will be welcomed with a smile. Passion for excellent food and exceptional, friendly service is the Stockyard Philosophy. The Stockyard offers a comfortable, tavern-style environment with a roaring fireplace. The 42-seat bar has TVs for watching the game, and lots of solid drink choices. The menu includes USDA Prime Steaks, Seafood & Comfort Food favorites.

name: The Tip Tap Room
description: Exciting cuisine in Beacon Hill. From standards like steak tips & burgers to wild game & seafood.

name: Florina Pizzeria and Paninoteca
address: 16 Derne St in back of State House, Boston, MA 02114-4203

detailed_address.street: 16 Derne St, in back of State House

name: Savr
description: On the bustling Seaport waterfront at The St. Regis Residences, Boston, we welcome you to a spirited American bistro serving creative comfort classics and elevated bistro favorites. Here, we inspire our guests to "savor the moment" by eating well and enjoying every day. Led by Managing Partner David Doyle, the entire guest experience harkens back to an era when guests are welcomed personally by the restauranteur and every meal includes warm and friendly yet impeccable service. At SAVR(tm), that era lives again.

name: UNI
description: UNI is a lively, contemporary izakaya located in The Eliot Hotel on Commonwealth Avenue. Helmed by Chef-Partners, Ken Oringer and Tony Messina, the menu highlights global street food-inspired small plates, innovative makimono, nigiri and sashimi, alongside craft cocktails and a wide-ranging sake program. Late night on Friday and Saturday nights, UNI presents a menu featuring the restaurant's cult-followed ramen, as well as a wide selection of sushi and small plates.
address: 370A Commonwealth Ave The Eliot Hotel, Boston, MA 02215

name: Coppa
description: Coppa is an intimate enoteca tucked on a quiet side street in Boston's South End featuring Italian small plates created by James Beard Award-winning Chefs Jamie Bissonnette and Ken Oringer. Everything is made with locally sourced and sustainable ingredients. Coppa has an eclectic wine list, and unique cordial-based cocktails. We offer a patio in the warmer months. Please note that patio & bar are first come first serve. You can book dining reservations on Open Table or by calling the restaurant. Please also visit our sister restaurant, Toro on Washington street in the South End of Boston.

name: Brewer's Fork
description: A Wood-Fired craft beer and wine neighborhood restaurant in Hayes Sq. Charlesotwn

name: Bar Mezzana
description: A coastal Italian restaurant by Chef Colin Lynch located in Boston's South End neighborhood, Bar Mezzana's menu highlights the simplicity and beauty of regional Italian cooking. In addition to a selection of handmade pastas- there is a separate daily crudo menu, sections of the menu dedicated to both sliced -to--order Prosciutto di Parma, and a variety of seasonal crostini, as well as seasonal entrees. The beverage program showcases Italian wines thoughtfully selected to pair with Chef Colin's food and includes both widely- loved varietals from all over Italy and lesser known (but equally enjoyable) discoveries. The selection of draft and bottled beers, as well as Beverage Director Ryan Lotz's cocktail list, display a similar synergy with the food and feature celebrated Italian cocktails including a perfect Negroni, in addition to the classics.
address: 360 Harrison Ave Boston, MA, Boston, MA 02118

name: Stephanie's on Newbury
description: Sophisticated Comfort Food

name: Trade
description: TRADE opened it's doors in 2011 with a very simple and effective approach: great atmosphere, great service, great food. Our James Beard Award Winning Chef, Jody Adams, partnered with Eric Papachristos and Sean Griffing to bring an upscale casual restaurant & bar to Atlantic Wharf. Guests enjoy small plates and shareables, wood-stone oven flatbreads, creative cocktails and more - all featuring bold flavors inspired by our team's travels. Untethered to just one cuisine, we offer a variety of tastes reminiscent of the coastal Mediterranean prepared using locally sourced ingredients. TRADE features an unparalleled atmosphere with floor to ceiling windows showcasing views of the Greenway. Our bright, energetic lunch service transitions to a sleek and sexy scene in the evenings for cocktails and dinner; reflecting our location on the edge of the Financial District and the Seaport District.

name: Empire Asian Restaurant & Lounge
description: Operated by the award-winning Big Night Entertainment Group, Empire is a 14,000-square-foot boutique Asian restaurant and lounge located in the Seaport area of Boston, just steps from the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center. Empire offers a tantalizing menu from executive Chef Kevin Long (Tosca, Shrine, Red Lantern, GEM, Scorpion Bar), stylized interior and ethereal atmosphere that will transport guests to another world. With a capacity of 600 guests and three 40-seat private dining rooms that open up to one large private event space, Empire can accommodate groups of all sizes for receptions and seated dinners.

name: Pier 6
description: Our restaurant is located on Pier 6 in Charlestown, steps from the oldest commissioned naval ship in the world, the USS Constitution. The restaurant space features many nautical design elements along with a roof deck, large outdoor patio & bar, private dining room, mahogany bar, and dining room with floor to ceiling glass sliding doors providing stunning waterfront views. Relax and enjoy our inviting waterfront location.

name: Capo Restaurant
description: RETRO VIBES & GOOD TIMESTucked underneath Capo Restaurant, the Supper Club looks to recapture the excitement of going out on the town for dinner and a show.The Supper Club at Capo is a 4,000sf subterranean lounge located next door to Capo Restaurant and below Citizen's Bank. The Supper Club is accessible through a connecting staircase located in Capo's dining room at 443 West Broadway. There is a private entrance located at 439 West Broadway which is available for private events only. The Supper Club at Capo consists of a 40ft bar, a large performance stage for live music and entertainment, a stage-front dance floor with two retro stage-side lounges. Follow us on social media to stay up to date with our current live music and entertainment schedule.

name: Contessa
description: Perched atop The Newbury Hotel like a crown jewel, Contessa is a grand destination. Guests are welcomed from morning till night to a sunlit, rooftop restaurant with Art Deco references and mid-century modern detailing, offering sweeping views of Back Bay and the Boston Public Garden. The menu offers a wide variety of delicious options, from feasts of antipasti and carpaccios to pastas and large steaks.  A vast wine list, classic cocktails and a selection of dolci punctuate a beautiful meal.
address: 3 Newbury St The Newbury Boston Hotel, Boston, MA 02116

detailed_address.street: 3 Newbury St, The Newbury Boston Hotel

name: Winsor Dim Sum Cafe
address: 10 Tyler St between Beach St & Kneeland, Boston, MA 02111-1904

detailed_address.street: 10 Tyler St, between Beach St & Kneeland

name: Tavern at the End of the World
KAVA neo-taverna
description: Authentic Greek cuisine.

name: Casarecce Ristorante
description: Please visit our website casarecceboston.com Specializing in homemade artisanal pasta and excellent service. We make all our bread, pasta and sauces daily on premise. If you cannot find your time available, please visit our other restaurant at www.pappareboston.com on Hanover street.

name: Pink Taco
description: At Pink Taco, we keep it real. We all have a variety of food moods, so our playfully presented menu provides. It's simple: epic food, great drinks, and a good time. Join us for Taco Tuesday, Happy Hour and Brunch!

name: Clink.
description: CLINK. serves the freshest North Atlantic seafood, seasonal New England fare and delicious heritage meats. Executive Chef Patrick Bassett's creative menu, which highlights exceptional Port Clyde shellfish and lobster, heirloom produce and artisan cheeses, artfully marries European culinary tradition with contemporary American innovation. The dining room features vestiges of original jail cells and an open kitchen, while gold leather seats, butcher block tables and granite accents add to its contemporary style.
address: 215 Charles St The Liberty, A Luxury Collection Hotel, Boston, Boston, MA 02114-3001

detailed_address.street: 215 Charles St, The Liberty, A Luxury Collection Hotel, Boston

name: Strega by Nick Varano
description: Strega is a hip Italian restaurant in the North End. Come enjoy fantastic food and a great atmosphere!

name: Zuma - Boston
description: Zuma, located at Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston is the 12th and the latest addition to the international collection. Nestled in the heart of Boston, in the Back Bay neighborhood, it inspires informal dining with Japanese izakaya concept.
address: 2nd Floor Four Seasons Hotel, Boston, MA 02115

name: Hojoko
description: Hojoko is a rock n roll izakaya honoring the pulse of japanese nightlife by serving sushi, robata grilled yakitori and street food small plates paired with craft cocktails, premium sake, wine and beer. As soon as it is safe to do so, we will bring back the live bands, spinning dj's and karaoke that have accompanied our food and beverage since opening in 2015!
address: 1271 Boylston St The Verb Hotel, Boston, MA 02215-3410

name: Locale Boston
description: Influenced by regions across Italy & the traditions & techniques of yesteryear.Locale brings 'la dolce vita' to Boston's historic North End neighborhood with house-made pastas, Neapolitan pizzas, market driven antipasti an eclectic yet approachable wine list.Chef: Rob Hurd

name: China Pearl Restaurant
description: Step inside Boston's Chinatown landmark and experience where tradition meets celebration. For over four decades, China Pearl, proudly operated by the Moy family, has been the go-to for authentic dim sum by day and iconic Cantonese banquets by night -- served in a buzzing, chandelier-lit dining hall just steps from the historic Chinatown Gate. From hand-folded dumplings to crispy roast duck and signature seafood platters, every dish hits like a family feast. Planning something bigger? Our multi-level space transforms for private events, weddings, and corporate gatherings, pairing heritage with heart. A favorite of Boston Magazine and The Boston Globe, this isn't just a meal -- it's a piece of Boston's culinary legacy. Come hungry, leave part of the story.

name: Filippo Ristorante & Bar
description: From famed Boston restauranteur Filippo Frattaroli, Fillipo is located within eye-shot of the TD Garden and we have proudly served authentic Italian cuisine to diners in the North End for more than three decades. Red-sauce classics are our specialty and Renaissance-style wall art complete the ambiance. We focus on classic, as well as innovative, Italian dishes with a focus on our family's home region of Italy - Abruzzo.
