name: Brighton Bodega
description: At Brighton Bodega our Executive Chef's seasonal and globally inspired menu changes daily. Featuring a raw bar and vegetarian selections, our small plate offerings are perfect to share. Our beverage program includes twenty painstakingly manicured draft lines, which host some of the best craft beers in New England and beyond. Our seasonally focused cocktail menu, range of fine spirits, and our eclectic, boutique driven wines stand alone for those seeking proper drinks outside of Boston proper.

name: Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steakhouse
description: Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steakhouse embodies the rich tradition of the classic American steakhouse, serving USDA Prime Beef, fresh seafood and premium wines from our award-winning wine selection.

name: Blaze Pizza
description: Exceptional quality at lightning fast speed is what we're all about. Artisanal ingredients on the assembly line. Inventive to classic. You decide from over 30+ toppings. Blazing hot oven + dedicated pizzasmith + 180 seconds = fast-fire'd, perfectly crisp perfection. Sound good? Enjoy the rest of your day.

name: Amar
address: 40 Trinity Pl Raffles Boston, Boston, MA 02116

name: The Red Fox
description: The Red Fox is an Italian American restaurant and lounge brought to you by All Day Hospitality Group (Tony & Elaine's, Ciao Roma, Farmacia, Ward 8). The focus of the menu is on handmade pasta and a mix of throwback dishes and Italian classics, with a fantastic cocktail menu with nostalgic martinis and high quality seasonal cocktails, and an excellent wine list. Located in The North End, The Red Fox pays homage to the Italian American neighborhood and some of the great old school establishments in the city.

name: Galley Diner
description: Anthony Bourdain, host of the TV travel guide show, featured Paul and the Galley in one of his episodes. Fitted with 4 tables and a 12 stool lunch counter, it always seems to have a crowd, but somehow Paul always finds room. With good reason, the Galley is known as a breakfast shop. Virtually any omelet you can think of, western or eastern, sandwiches, eggs anyway you like them, the hand-carved ham right off the bone is to die for. Corned beef hash, sausages, linguica, steak, bacon, they are all available. Home Fries are actually that, homemade and the best. Best of Boston awarded by Boston Magazine for 2013 and 2014 for Best DIner

name: The Lansdowne Pub
description: For centuries a major part of the Irish culture and community has been the Publik House. Every town in Ireland has their own pub, a meeting place in which members of the community can gather to relax, celebrate, and bond over a pint or a song. For over a century the city of Boston has been rich with Irish tradition and heritage. And many the many Irish ideas that immigrated their way across the Atlantic, the idea of the Pub was not left behind. Lansdowne Street has for decades been one of Boston's most popular destination - from the Red Sox to concerts and bars, the street had almost everything you could ask for.It is our pleasure to bring to you the combination of Irish culture and Boston heritage with a little Lansdowne Street flair. A place where the community can come together to celebrate and relax. Enjoy amazing traditional Irish fare, a pint of cold beer, and the type of atmosphere that will keep you coming back for years to come. We bring to you, The Lansdowne.

name: Nando Ristorante Enoteca
description:
New Italian restaurant featuring Sicilian and modern Italian dishes.
"Where Old World meets New... A Place where Our Famiglia will become Yours!"
address: 393 Hanover St North End, Boston, MA 02113-1308

name: Gather
description: Gather is a full-service restaurant and bar overlooking Boston Harbor. We serve inventive, modern American inspired cuisine that accommodates all palates.

name: Blue Nile
description: Blue Nile specializes in healthy food prepared from scratch using only the highest-quality natural ingredients. At Blue Nile, you'll be sure to find a fresh, healthy meal for an affordable price right in the heart of JP.

name: Punjab Palace
description: Punjab Palace delivers an authentic, home-style cooking Indian experience. We take pride in the creation of savory, sweet, and delectable dishes. Some of our popular favorites include spinach poori bread, coconut korma, our creamy, delicious chicken tikka masala, baingan bharta eggplant and more. Diners can enjoy over 30 different kinds of beer and wine with their meals as well. When you step into our restaurant, you will see traditional Indian decor and decorations. If you can't dine with us, we offer take out service and delivery, and we're on Uber Eats! Come to Punjab Palace for a truly tasty, deeply authentic Indian dining experience!

name: Rincon Limeno
description: The Rincon Limeno Restaurant is located in East Boston, Massachusetts. The quality of our service is only surpassed by the quality of our food. We have been serving the most exquisite Peruvian cuisine and we think it's time that you experience it for yourself. As you enter let yourself be whisked away by sights, sounds, and aromas... But that is just the beginning. We guarantee one visit will keep you coming again and again. You'll be drawn in by the authentic Peruvian decor as you venture on a gastronomic adventure into the traditional flavors of Peru. The aromas of our delicious dishes will keep you on the edge of your seat and when your food arrives we guarantee every bite will blow you away -We stake our reputation on that.

name: Servia Restaurant
description:
Servia is Boston's premier dining destination for modern Mediterranean cuisine. We are located in Boston's Financial District directly behind Faneuil Hall and Quincy Market, in the heart of Boston. Inspired by the complex flavors of Italy, Spain, Greece and beyond, our menu includes mezze shareables, house made pasta, and fresh seafood, with a rotating menu from the mind of Chef Claudio Cavalleri, an Italy native.

Servia's authentic scratch-kitchen features items made fresh daily, from dressing and pita to grass-fed beef and locally-sourced seafood, and 95% of our ingredients are organic, many coming directly from the Mediterranean. Servia also offers a sophisticated bar for dinner and late-night with handcrafted cocktails, European and local beer, and an extensive wine selection.

Servia's name pays homage to the ship you'll see in the window of our building, a transatlantic ocean liner owned by Cunard, that transported passengers from Boston to Europe in the late 1800s
address: 126 State St Cunard Building, Boston, MA 02109

name: Brinkleys Restaurant & Pub
address: 225 William F McClellan Hwy, Boston, MA 02128-1176

name: The Trophy Room
description: A favorite with the locals, Trophy Room is the epicenter of fun for the South End neighborhood. With a colorful atmosphere, superb food and drink options, and a lively brunch on Sundays. Everyone is welcome at The Trophy Room! Where bartenders will create your favorite cocktail while you enjoy all-American favorites like our Bistro Burger in the coolest space in the South End. After your first visit, you'll want to become a local too!

name: Dillon's Restaurant and Bar
description: History comes alive when you step inside Dillon's, a Boston landmark that was once a Boston Police Department prescient, which was home to our namesake, Captain Dillon, who held court from 1925 through to 1950. Captain Dillon's sense of community, sociability and hospitality are personified throughout Dillon's, from our effervescent nightlife through to the rousing social scene on our sunny patio.

name: Flight Club Boston
description: Located in the Seaport neighborhood just south of downtown Boston, Flight Club is an upscale entertainment concept combining elevated food and beverage menus with dynamic tech-enabled Social Darts(r). What is Social Darts(r)? Fast-paced multiplayer games, groundbreaking tracking technology, and instant scoring built to bring people together, whether you're a rookie or a self-proclaimed pro!

name: Rocco's Cucina & Bar
description: "Rocco's Cucina Restaurant & Bar was established in 2000 by owner Rocco Zagarella. Located in Boston's historic North End, it has become one of Boston's premier dining spots on the waterfront of Downtown Boston. Combining friendly North End Service with good food, Rocco's Cucina is a great place for drinks and fun. Classic Authentic Italian American Cuisine."

name: Para Maria
description: Para Maria embodies the heartwarming experiences of making and breaking bread with family and friends. It is not just a place to eat, but also the sound of laughter and conversation floating above a patio at sunset. It's toasting to the weekend with an ice cold margarita after a long day at work. The sweet drip of a melting paleta. The smell of smoked meats and vegetables on the grill and the lingering spice of the perfect bite that draws you back in for more.

name: Hobgoblin
description: Our gastropub, Hobgoblin, features magical elements, like our potions, our gargoyle street lamps and our paintings of medieval monsters, based on sketches by monks and nuns. We offer Asian small plates, creative cocktails, twenty rotating craft beers on tap, plus a wide range of bottles and cans, selective wine and champagne lists. Moreover, our downstairs bar and dining space features a 7 foot Yamaha C6X; we will present live piano shows and smaller musical acts on weekend nights. Thursday, Friday & Saturday 1st set: 7 - 8:10 pm 2nd set: 8:30 - 9:40 pm 3rd set: 10 -11 pm

name: Publico Street Bistro
description: Imagine yourself wandering through a local public market, enjoying culturally unique street foods, socializing and immersing yourself in new or familiar surroundings. We believe, for the public good, everyone should have the chance to experience this magic.We proudly invite you to join us at Publico, where our goal is to channel the senses of exploring a new locale through globally inspired fare, libations, and mid-century meets rustic decor.Our simple plates meld elements and flavors from Europe, South and North America. Prepared with traditional techniques and time tested recipes, our approachable offerings highlight the season's freshest, sensibly sourced ingredients from local farms and purveyors. Paired with wine selections from around the world, a selection of local craft beers, or indulgent cocktails, your experience is designed to leave you with a modestly priced passport stamp for your palette.

name: Vintage Restaurant and Lounge
description: Vintage Restaurant & Lounge is an upscale restaurant serving dinner & late night dining (until 12:30am), and cocktails until 2 a.m. Vintage Restuarant & Lounge serves New American cuisine. We offer an exquisite wine list with over 100 award winning wines with glass, half bottle, and full bottle options. A fabulous small plates menu along with signature martinis are offered in our lounge. Vintage Restaurant & Lounge features a dining room, two bars, a lounge, and an outdoor patio. The interior decor is comprised of an elegant chandelier in the dining room, custom made rich brown leather chairs and bar stools, custom dark wood dining tables, and bamboo flooring. Private function space is available for groups ranging from 6 to 270. Vintage caters to people looking for quality and sophistication in a relaxed atmosphere. We set a mood that no one else in the Financial District can offer and a value no one else can match. Come dine and enjoy with us soon.

name: Greenhills Irish Bakery
description: Bakery/cafe. Coffee And Tea And A Variety Of Morning Pastries. Breakfast Egg Sandwiches- Many Options. Irish Specialties And Irish Groceries. Irish Soda Bread, Brown Bread And Scones. Lunch Specials Daily And Sandwiches Made To Order.

Other features include a wide-open store front, a wood-fired pizza oven, and an impressive menu that has something for everyone.

description: Brownstone is a neighborhood gem that has become a must-visit for locals and tourists. A scratch-kitchen led by Executive Chef Kelly Snogles craft some of the finest culinary treats in the Back Bay. We start our day with brunch and wrap up with our late night menu, you'll always find something from the kitchen, or behind the bay, to suit your tastes.

name: Legal Sea Foods - Logan Airport Terminal C
description: Relax and enjoy a delicious meal or quick bite before your flight at our Logan Airport Terminal C location! We're located post-security. Enjoy our all-day menu of New England seafood classics or if you're in a rush enjoy Legal to-go before you take off. Please note that our airport locations close 30 minutes prior to the last departing flight, so schedules may vary! Loading...

Never Stop Looking Up!

HOW TO GO ABOUT YOUR DAY ....

Start your morning at our coffee bar paired with amazing Breakfast or Brunch.

Stroll down in the starry night and enjoy a great fusion menu for a family dinner or a date night.

name: dbar
description: Open 7 days a week, dbar is a full service restaurant that seamlessly transforms into a nightclub and lounge as the night goes on. Formally an old school Irish pub filled with mahogany charm, dbar has been renovated into a hip chic hot spot. With warm glowing candles & long leather banquettes, dbar offers a casual and comfortable atmosphere that attracts clientele from Dorchester and surrounding areas.

name: Olive Garden Italian Restaurant
description: All of your favorites are just a few clicks away! View our menu online and Order To Go Now or come in for our famous never-ending first course of freshly baked breadsticks and your choice of homemade soup or garden fresh salad. Enjoy abundant portions of classic entrees the whole family craves like the Tour of Italy, our irresistible Chicken Parmigiana, or everyone's favorite Fettuccine Alfredo, made fresh from our kitchen to your table. Gather together with the people you love over a meal worth sharing at Olive Garden. When you're here, you're family.
address: 11B Allstate Road South Bay Plaza, Boston, MA 02125

name: Ciao Roma
description: Located in Boston's North End, Ciao Roma offers a unique Southern Italian dining experience with a modern touch. Enjoy authentic flavors with dishes made using fresh, seasonal ingredients while also serving classics such as, Pappardelle Bolognese and Chicken Parmigiana. Pair your meal with our curated wine list and refreshing cocktails. And don't forget to try our award winning espresso martini! Join us for our Italian-inspired weekend brunch or dine al fresco on our patio during the summer. Perfect for date night, birthdays, anniversaries, and special occasions, our restaurant provides an elegant setting with views of historic North Square.

name: Seaport Social
description: Seaport Social is a premier and authentic Social House that is poised to proudly serve the Boston area for many years to come! Our mission is to provide high-quality food and a unique craft beer selection, along with a welcoming atmosphere for all those that wish to witness firsthand what the Boston social spirit is all about.
address: 225 Northern Ave Seaport District, Boston, MA 02210-2040

name: Mida
description: MIDA by Chef Douglass William's is now open on East Boston's waterfront. Our James Beard Nominated restaurant group is situated directly on the edge of the pier with panoramic views of the downtown Boston Skyline. The restaurant is surrounded by the water on three sides with a massive patio that is perfect for date night and large groups at all hours of the day. Vaulted ceilings, sprawling windows, and a gorgeous lighting profile make this location the perfect destination for all occasions. MIDA East Boston also features a 25 seat bar that is open for walk-ins seven days a week. We are thrilled to be a part of this neighborhood and cannot wait to welcome you into our home. XOXO MIDA
address: 65 Lewis St Waterfront Retail, Boston, MA 02128

name: Bar Moxy
description: Welcome to Bar Moxy, where vibrancy meets playfulness in an atmosphere designed to make every moment unforgettable. Our rooftop event space, Area 24, offers breathtaking views and an electric atmosphere, while our second floor bar is the heartbeat of the action, inviting you to mingle, unwind, and enjoy every moment.

name: Devlin's Restaurant and Bar
description: Welcome to Devlin's Restaurant, where we've got a little bit of downtown uptown. We serve great cuisine that's both innovative and traditional in Brighton Center Mass.Delicious seafood and meat dishes, pastas, salads, sandwiches, homemade desserts and an extensive wine and specialty drink list are why people keep coming back to Devlin's. All of this combined with a pleasant chic environment and friendly helpful wait staff makes Devlin's the perfect place for business, social, and family dining.

name: Wink & Nod
description: Wink & Nod is a craft cocktail bar located on 3 Appleton Street in the South End of Boston. Wink & Nod runs a scratch bar, where we prepare our cordials, fresh juices and infusions in-house, from scratch, on a daily basis. Our cocktails change seasonally. Wink & Nod operates a Culinary Incubator program, where every 6 months, we invite a new Chef to run our kitchen and experiment with dishes as bold and creative as our cocktails. With this program, Wink & Nod hopes to contribute to the development of up-and-coming Chefs by providing them with a restaurant platform in which to operate and showcase their talent.

name: Capri
description: At Capri, in the heart of Boston's South End, our mission is to offer an unforgettable neighborhood dining experience rooted in Italian tradition and driven by seasonal ingredients. We take pride in our housemade pastas, fresh seafood, curated wines, and vibrant cocktails--each crafted to delight. With heartfelt hospitality at our core, we strive to make every guest feel genuinely welcomed and cared for. Whether gathering indoors, dining fireside on our outdoor terrace, or celebrating in a private room, Capri is dedicated to delivering exceptional cuisine and warm, authentic service in every moment.

Our outdoor seating is WEATHER PERMITTING. In the event that the weather is not cooperating at the time of your reservation, we are unable to guarantee your reservation. Thank you for your understanding.

name: Action Kitchen
description: Imagine yourself and your guests in a gleaming gourmet kitchen with state-of-the-art equipment, the freshest regional ingredients and a menu custom crafted by a world-class chef. And you're not here just to enjoy the food - you get to help prepare each unforgettable dish with expert guidance every step of the way. Add wine, music and lively conversation, and this is no ordinary group activity or event-it's the ultimate cooking party in the ultimate kitchen. Action Kitchen is the perfect idea for one-of-a-kind celebrations with family and friends. It's also a fresh way for corporate teams to build camaraderie and enhance teamwork.

name: Pappare Ristorante
description: Pappare Ristorante and Bar is now open in Boston's North End.   All  pasta is made fresh on premise daily.  We make our own papardelle, spaghetti and casarecce daily.    Gnocci and ravioli are also made on premise.  Seafood and vegetarian options available.  Wine, beer and liquors available.  Large elegant dining room and bar with floor to ceiling window overlooking historic Hanover Street.  Validated parking available.  Sister restaurant of Casarecce Ristorante located in the North End.

name: Crudo
description: A modern Japanese restaurant blending the art of sushi with modern local ingredients.

name: Matria
description: Piedmont, Italy's unique position at the foothills of the Alps has shaped its time-honored culinary traditions, which favor simple, ingredient driven fare layered with the finest cuts of meat. Guests of Matria, our northern Italian steakhouse, are invited to explore the diverse flavors and ingredients of this exquisite region in a warm, inviting, waterside environment. Matria reveals a respect for the details of Italian cooking and culture. Its modern, chef-driven sensibilities are perfect for celebrating over an apertivo, intimate dinner, or lively brunch. As a bonus, it sports one of the best waterfront views in Boston.

name: Shun's Kitchen
description: Shun's Kitchen brings you to a traditional Chinese dining experience. Complete with a private dining room with fish tank and bar which make the perfect setting for any party or event. Enjoy our Pan-Asian cuisine which includes a variety of grilled steaks, chicken, seafood, sushi, ramen, Chinese stir fry, and more. Our drink menu features a remarkable array of cocktails, wine, and sake.

name: Avana Sushi
description: Avana Sushi offers authentic and delicious tasting Sushi in Boston, MA. Avana Sushi's conveniently located on Franklin St and its affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for dine-in, take-out meals in the Boston community. Our restaurant offers full sushi menu including an array of Chef's Special Maki. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

Our meals are cooked throughout the day and made with extreme care. Our staff will consistently deliver kindness and be friendly towards our customers. Customers will in any event receive guaranteed customer service. Lazuri Cafe's purpose is to deliver enjoyment, satisfaction, and most important to deliver fresh food to our customers!

name: Scholars American Bistro and Cocktail Lounge
description: Located along the historic Freedom Trail, at the heart of Boston's downtown area, is Scholars American Bistro and Cocktail Lounge. Boasting a stylish and vibrant interior, Scholars has established itself as the favored venue for locals and tourists alike. Patrons can savor a mouth-watering selection of food, inspired by regional classics and superbly complimented by our chef's original approach, late into the night. An extensive selection of tasty cocktails, refreshing beers and fine wines are sure to satisfy any palate. We also serve Brunch on Saturdays and Sundays from 11am until 3pm in addition to our all day menu. Thursday, Friday and Saturday nights from 10pm Scholars features some of Boston's best DJs playing classic hits.

name: Viva Mi Arepa
description: Viva Mi Arepa is a Venezuelan restaurant that offers a delicious array of authentic Venezuelan cuisine. From savory arepas to flavorful pabellon criollo, our menu is full of traditional Venezuelan dishes that will transport you to the streets of Caracas. Whether you're craving a hearty meal or looking to explore the vibrant flavors of Venezuela, Viva Mi Arepa is the perfect destination for an unforgettable culinary experience. Join us and indulge in the rich and diverse flavors of Venezuelan cuisine.

name: Taiyaki NYC - Boston
description: The original creators of Taiyaki Ice Cream, Croyaki, and Unicorn Float. We're internationally recognized for our fish-shaped Japanese waffle that is chewy on the inside and crispy on the outside; the textures and flavors blend perfectly in glorious harmony with the artisan flavors of soft serve ice cream.

name: Wahlburgers

address: 9 District Ave South Bay Center, Boston, MA 02125-1683

name: Warehouse Kitchen + Sports Bar
description: The concept here is pretty simple. We like to watch sports. We like to drink great beer, fresh cocktails and delicious wine. We like to eat really good food made from scratch. We like relaxed atmospheres with friendly service & warm hospitality. Occasionally, we even like to dance! So, that is what we strive to offer here at Warehouse Boston - an upscale sports bar that offers great food & beverages in a relaxed atmosphere where you might wind up dancing after dinner or the big game. Our fare is described as fresh, quality, bar food. We make food that we like to eat so we can assure that you'll like it as well. We make things that go well with beer, cocktails and wine and utilize the freshest ingredients we can find. Our scratch kitchen has something to offer for everyone and our fabulous staff will ensure that all your dietary needs are met. Warehouse is located at the intersection of the Financial District & Faneuil Hall and is just steps from Greenway & Boston Aquarium

name: Mighty Squirrel Brewing Co. - Fenway
description: Mighty Squirrel is a spacious taproom and kitchen one block away from Fenway Park. Offering pizzas, salads, tacos, and more and a wide variety of beers, hard seltzers, and hard smoothies, there's something for every taste. The establishment has several private event spaces that can be reserved for special occasions.

name: Hampshire House
description: The Hampshire House in Boston is an historic mansion that is now a wedding and event venue as well as a restaurant. The executive chef at the Hampshire House uses a variety of global flavors to create a modern, unique menu filled with seasonal items that all highlight a local ingredient. In addition to lunch and dinner, guests can also enjoy brunch and high tea. Dinner at The Hampshire House includes appetizers such as clam chowder and lobster bisque, as well as entrZes such as veal chops and grilled swordfish. Tea time includes a variety of petite fours and sandwiches like smoked salmon or English cucumber. Any time diners want a uniquely gorgeous dining experience, the rotating menu at The Hampshire House is the perfect solution.

name: Red Apple Farm
description: Red Apple Farm is one of 40 select vendors at the Boston Public Market. The Boston Public Market is an indoor, year round marketplace for locally sourced groceries and specialty agricultural products, where residents and visitors can find fresh, seasonal food from Massachusetts and New England. Red Apple Farm is proud to feature all its favorite farm fare fresh from the farm. Our mini-cider donuts are made daily at the market!
address: 100 Hanover St The Boston Public Market, Boston, MA 02108-2407

description: Adding a modern twist to classic New England cuisine, dining on the Boston Waterfront at Battery Wharf Hotel brings land and sea together to honor the region's fishermen, farmers and culinary artisans. Set against the breathtaking backdrop of Boston Harbor, Battery Wharf Grille is a loved-by-locals favorite. Stellar, chef-driven menus and a sprawling footprint make it equally suited for casual all-day dining, drinks on the Terrace around an urban fire pit (opening in April) and handcrafted cocktails in the Battery Lounge.

name: Figs by Todd English
description: "Never Trust a Round Pizza." Figs Pizza is most likely like no other pizza you've ever had. Don't be surprised by the large freeform shape--it's specifically part of what will go into your overall experience in enjoying this unique meal. The crust will be so crisp and thin it will be close to brittle. That finely crisped quality is achieved by the special technique used in making the dough and a short cooking time at a very high temperature. The toppings are the finest freshest available and are, as often as possible local produce and other ingredients. #RespectThePizza

Immerse yourself in a delightful atmosphere filled with great music and a relaxed ambiance as you enjoy the historic South End.

Late night menu Friday and Saturday to 1:30am. The bar is open until 2am. The second floor may be booked for private events.

name: Cityside Bar & Restaurant
description: Cityside Tavern has been a staple in Cleveland Circle since 1985. We underwent a renovation in January 2020, now our space is rustic and airy featuring beautiful brickwork and barn-board from Maine. Our bi-level space features two bars, a separate dining room and an awesome roof deck overlooking Cleveland CircleOur dinner menu consists of elevated comfort food along hearty New England fare, killer burgers and sandwiches. We also feature a lunch menu during the weekdays and a weekend brunch program.We feature a full bar with a draft beer program focusing on some of the best local Craft breweries as well a cocktail program with riffs on some classics, as well as our own unique creations.Cityside Tavern is the perfect place for large groups, semi-private events, watching our local sporting teams or just a chill night at one of our bars with our awesome team. We host Trivia on Wednesdays and Brunch on Saturday & Sunday. See you soon!

name: Molinari's Pizzeria
description: "I wanted to do a place with good Italian comfort food. The simplicity of it, the freshness of it, the quality of ingredients that you get to work with." They specialize in that quintessential Italian comfort food - pizza. "I think it's great that the city of Boston is turning around and starting to become known for pizza like the other big cities in the country," he said. "It is such a simple food but it all comes down to the quality of ingredients." It's all done out of an open kitchen where the star of the show is Molinari's wood burning oven.

name: Mcgonagle's Pub & Restaurant
description: At McGonagle's, we pride ourselves on all things authentic Ireland. Whether you join us for a hearty brunch, a leisurely lunch, or an evening dinner, our menu offers a variety of dishes that are sure to satisfy your cravings. We focus on using fresh ingredients and age-old recipes to create meals that will make your belly full and your heart happy. Come dine with us and experience the rich flavors of Ireland right here at McGonagle's!

name: The Berkeley
description: The Berkeley Bistro + Bar, located in Boston's Back Bay neighborhood, serves New England classic dishes with a touch of French-bistro inspiration, crafted from the freshest local ingredients. Pair your meal with an expertly prepared cocktail or a selection from our thoughtfully curated wine list. Whether you're planning a casual gathering or a special occasion, The Berkeley provides the perfect setting. Enjoy the lively atmosphere on our Bar Side--or opt for our Dining Room side-- where a refined bistro-style experience awaits. Weather permitting, The Berkeley's outdoor terraces offer a charming al fresco setting. Visit theberkeleyboston.com to explore seasonal menus, hours, private event options, and weekly happenings.

name: Ali Baba Restaurant & Cafe
description: Ali Baba Restaurant in Southend brings the rich and diverse flavors of Turkish cuisine to your table. Our menu features authentic Turkish dishes, including succulent grilled meats, freshly baked bread, mezes, and delicious vegetarian options. Whether you're looking for a cozy dine-in experience, takeaway, or convenient online ordering, Ali Baba guarantees the finest ingredients and traditional recipes. Join us to experience the warm hospitality and vibrant tastes of Turkey. Open 7 days a week--visit us today and enjoy a true taste of Turkish culture!

name: Chicken & Rice Guys
description: Slinging steamy plates since 2012, Chicken & Rice Guys introduced Boston to the ridiculously delicious world of chicken and rice. With high quality ingredients, alluring aromas, and a seductive selection of homemade sauces, we've elevated street food to the next level.

name: No Relation

The omakase menu, with optional beverage pairings, is served nightly at 6:00 pm and 8:30 pm. 14 courses feature traditional Japanese sashimi and nigiri plus contemporary interpretations. Reservations are required.

We have food, vibes for all ages, and plenty of space for private events and in house catering. We enjoy catering to our guests and providing an overall great experience! We serve Mexican brunch Saturday and Sundays, come have breakfast and Mimosa Towers, or Join us late when the Sunsets for Tacos and Beer!

name: STK Steakhouse
description: STK is a unique concept that artfully blends the modern steakhouse and a chic lounge into one, offering a dynamic, fine dining experience with the superior quality of a traditional steakhouse. At our spacious bar bar with unique cocktails, local beers and a wine list featuring top producers from around the world. No matter where you find yourself seated, you'll take in our warm and welcoming atmosphere, barrel-vaulted ceilings, antique chandeliers, and seating inspired by vintage railroad boxcars.

description: Whether you are heading out to the quiet nestled town of Winthrop on the beach, hopping out of the T into the heart of East Boston, or to the bustling busy streets of Revere, you will find a D'Parma Restaurant to welcome you with open arms. 20 years ago, I decided to bring that little taste of Italy from the north end to our home town of Winthrop, we shouldn't have to travel far for good food and here my family and I strive to do just that. We are a family run and operated business that serves fresh food on a daily basis seven days a week. Delicious food is made with quality products, freshest ingredients, and friendly service. We care about the food we serve, so bring your family to meet my family and enjoy!

name: Chipotle Mexican Grill

The company is cultivating a better world by serving responsibly sourced, classically-cooked, real food with wholesome ingredients without artificial colors, flavors or preservatives. Using only 53 real ingredients, the company's "Food with Integrity" principles prioritize sourcing ingredients from farms that adhere to humane and sustainable practices. Chipotle team members use classic culinary techniques and serve handcrafted entrees in abundance at an extraordinary value. To get exclusive offers and earn free food, sign up for Chipotle Rewards.

Enjoy a few small plates with friends while choosing the perfect pizza for you! Finish your stay with an amaro, limoncello, or North Ends favorite, an Espresso Martini, made with home-made cold brew espresso. We're looking forward to having you!

At Tony's place, the meats are all choice cuts, and the fish and seafood are of the highest quality. Tony's Place has a wonderful selection of house and imported wines and beer. name: Cafe at John F Kennedy Library
Lilly's Gourmet Pasta Express
description: Lilly D'Alelio came to the United States many years ago from Milan, Italy, with the idea of making the best and the healthiest pasta. She started making pasta in a small store in Everett, Massachusetts. Her son, Antonio joined her and together they have grown into one of the finest and best known pasta manufacturers in the greater New England area. Lilly still works long days and has created an extensive selection of all-natural pastas. Lilly's Pasta is made from the finest 100% durum wheat (semolina), pasteurized eggs, and filtered water. All of the pasta and fillings are all natural. All fillings are cooked in broth, with no added fat, making the pasta very healthy. The pasta is fortified with folic acid (the synthetic form of naturally occurring folate), the health benefits that are important throughout our lives. In a woman's childbearing years, folic acid is a key nutrient before conception because it helps to prevent some birth defects.

Widely considered being one of Boston's top waterfront restaurants, Tia's on the Waterfront is a casual restaurant that serves traditional and home-cooked Seafood and American cuisine. The patio overlooks Boston's beautiful waterfront and also offers great views of the many nearby parks, monuments and boardwalk. Tia's holds one of the larger outdoor patio's in the city. The dining room at Tia's on the Waterfront has an inviting and laid back feel and has been decorated with a large bar, dim lighting and ample seating.

It is not just the enjoyable atmosphere that draws people to Tia's on the Waterfront, the restaurant also serves a menu that consists of classic favorites, including Lobster Rolls, Fried Green Beans, New England Clam Chowder, Flatbreads, Delicious Fresh Salads, Frozen Cocktails, Craft and Local Beers and much much more.

name: The Fed at the Langham, Boston
description:
Named #4 Best Hotel Bar in the US by USA Today's 2024 10Best Readers' Choice awards.

A charming destination bar, The Fed, is a British-inspired cocktail bar with a New England twist. Located at The Langham, Boston hotel, a sophisticated space with a large and animated central bar, surrounding seating for a more intimate experience and a seasonal outdoor Rose Garden terrace. Serving craft cocktails and beers and elevated pub fare, The Fed is the place to celebrate any of life's moments, big or small.

The Fed's cocktail operations are helmed by Aliz Meszesi, a household name in Boston's cocktail scene. Enjoy New England favorites such as a Maine Lobster Roll, Oysters, Boston Brown Bread, Smash Burger and Pork Belly Bites by Executive Chef Daniel Burger.

name: Sugar Factory - Boston
description: Welcome to Sugar Factory Boston, located at 101 S. Market Street in the city's bustling heart, within the iconic Quincy Market at Faneuil Hall. Our newest establishment offers a vibrant celebration of modern indulgence, where classic American cuisine meets the whimsical wonders of our world-famous confections. Sugar Factory Boston is more than just a restaurant; it's an enchanting urban oasis that promises a feast for the senses. Whether you're craving our legendary gourmet burgers, indulging in a towering dessert, or sipping on our signature smoking candy goblets, your experience will be nothing short of extraordinary. Our diner is a treasure trove designed for the Instagram age, with sparkling decor that pays homage to Boston's historic charm while infusing it with a chic, contemporary twist. Every corner is a backdrop for memories that are as sweet as our treats. From celebratory birthdays to spontaneous sweet-tooth cravings, Sugar Factory Boston at Quincy Market is the perfect destination for moments that deserve a dash of sugar and a splash of luxury. Join us and savor the magic.

name: Legal Sea Foods - Park Square
description: Since 1980, we've been a staple in Boston's Park Square. Now relocated and renovated, our new spot at the corner of Arlington Street offers a wrap-around bar, open raw bar, and expansive lounge and dining areas. In warmer months, our patio provides a charming outdoor dining option right across from the Park Plaza Hotel. Enjoy local favorites, including Boston's best clam chowder, oysters and raw bar, lobster, grilled and fried seafood, as well as steaks, pasta and more!

We got you covered with our salads from the garden classic dressing options. Unlike many other Pizzerias, we offer many different foods using fresh healthy ingredients. name: Naksan Korean Bbq
description:
Naksan Korean BBQ in Boston offers an authentic Korean barbecue experience with a focus on high-quality meats. The cozy and inviting atmosphere, combined with efficient and attentive staff, makes it perfect for any occasion. Traditional Korean beverages like soju and beer complement the barbecue flavors. Naksan is not just a restaurant, but a culinary journey to Korea, making it a must-visit for Korean cuisine enthusiasts.

Naksan also offers a variety of other traditional Korean dishes. From the spicy and flavorful Kimchi to the comforting and savory Stews, each dish is prepared with the same attention to detail and commitment to authenticity. The restaurant also offers vegetarian options, ensuring that everyone can enjoy the Korean dining experience. With its combination of delicious food, warm ambiance, and excellent service, Naksan Korean BBQ truly brings a piece of Korea to Boston. It's not just a meal, but an immersive cultural experience that leaves you longing for more.

Behind each cocktail and each plate are countless hours of work, but most importantly immeasurable amount of shared pleasure between their creators. There are plenty of incredible drinks that we're excited about. Let us know what you're in the mood for, and we'll find the right drink for you.

description: Located in historic Lower Mills in Dorchester, The Bowery Bar is a neighborhood tavern focusing creative modern comfort food, a whimsical cocktail program, and local craft beer offerings. We are committed to our guests' experience and being an integral part of our local community. Our indoor dining space and bar is cozy and warm; the vintage decors hand-picked to encapsulate a space that makes you feel transported to simpler days. In the warmer months, come experience our spacious outdoor patio with an outdoor bar and lounge area for mingling, appetizers & cocktails. In the cooler months, watch our beautiful patio transform into a Winter Wonderland with our unique Yurts available to be booked for small private gatherings and group reservations.

name: Vaisakhi Indian Kitchen
description: We are Indian Punjabi Restaurant in the heart of Brighton & Allston. Its a dream of project of 3 friends, Baljit, Manjit & Arvind to serve great north Indian food to the Boston Community. The rich culture of Punjab, its flavors, and spices is what makes Vaisakhi. Vaisakhi is a festival of Punjabi New Year and Season for harvest in India. Vaisakhi will be the best way to enjoy great Indian food in the Boston Area.

name: Harborwalk Terrace
description:
The beloved Summer in the City series returns for another unforgettable season at the Boston Harbor Hotel, bringing live waterfront entertainment to the heart of Boston. From June 6th through August 28th, guests can enjoy al fresco evenings every Tuesday through Friday, set against the sparkling backdrop of the Boston Harbor.

Each night, a rotating lineup of talented performers takes the stage on our iconic floating barge, delivering a vibrant mix of Jazz, Soul, Country, R&B, DJ sets, and more. Whether you're planning a romantic evening or gathering with friends, Friday nights offer the perfect summer celebration.

This year, we're enhancing the experience with beautifully curated personal boxes, offering chilled, chef-crafted selections that make dining effortless--so you can sit back, relax, and take in the show. Plus, the Harborwalk Terrace returns Saturdays from 1PM to 7PM, serving creative cocktails and a wide-ranging wine list from one of the most scenic spots in the city.

description: The MFA's newest dining venue features executive chef Brian Flagg's seasonal menu emphasizing fresh local ingredients, with an environmentally friendly and innovative root-to-stalk approach. The Greatest Bar is a restaurant, bar, event venue, tourist attraction, museum, nightclub and so much more! Come celebrate the GREATEST people, places, moments and events that make Boston legendary! For nearly two decades, The Greatest Bar has been one of Boston's most exceptional and exciting venues featuring numerous unique and separate spaces spread over four floors.

name: TreMonte Restaurant - North End
description:
Nestled in the heart of Boston's iconic North End, TreMonte Restaurant & Bar invites you to enjoy the comforting, bold flavors of regional Italian cuisine in a stylish yet welcoming setting. Our menu highlights classic Italian favorites, with a focus on pastas, rustic artisan pizzas, and our signature pork chops--an enduring guest favorite.
While our offerings are centered around pasta and pizza, we also feature a few select dishes such as shrimp and chicken entrees, and seasonal specialties, all prepared with high-quality ingredients and traditional Italian techniques.
Whether you're joining us for a relaxed dinner, drinks at the bar, or a night out with friends, TreMonte offers a warm atmosphere that blends neighborhood charm & modern comfort. Our curated wine list and signature cocktails provide the perfect pairing to complete your dining experience.

At TreMonte, hospitality is at the heart of what we do. We look forward to welcoming you and making your time with us truly memorable.

Behind the bar, Hunter's has a wide range of beers, whiskeys, and craft cocktails.

**Please note: Patio tables are on a first come first serve basis and by request only. Please note your reservation if you would prefer to sit outside and we will do our best to accommodate**

name: Berklee Noodles Factory
description: Over the decade we spent living in Japan, we fell in love with ramen, especially tonkotsu ramen. So when we came back to the states, we knew we had to bring the artistry of this delicious dish with us. From there, we built a menu of authentic favorites: rice balls, pork chashu buns, and even Takoyaki! Our menu is full of amazing flavors, fresh ingredients, and thoughtful recipes that are perfect for casual dining or impressing your fellow foodies. We even imported our ramen-making machine from Japan, and make our noodles fresh in-house every day with it. So stop by and join us for a true taste of Hakata right here in Back Bay.

Slide into an earth tone banquette and enjoy a fusion of New England comfort foods and French cuisine. For breakfast, an avocado tartine and peaches & cream crunch French toast. name: Gyu-Kaku Japanese BBQ
description: Founded in Tokyo in 1996, Gyu-Kaku has become the world's #1 Japanese BBQ brand! Thanks to our devoted fans we have reached over 700 locations worldwide. Each day, hundreds of thousands of people gather around the table-top smokeless grill, a centerpiece of our dining concept, enjoying selections of premium meats, just off the grill, and other freshly prepared foods from our kitchens, inspiring laughter, conversation, and a magical dining experience. The Tasty BBQ has been actively serving the barbecue community for over four generations, making a name for themselves since 1932 at the Tasty BBQ restaurant in Boston, MA. description:
Midnight Morning is a vibrant, all-day gathering space in Boston's Roslindale Village--evolving from a specialty coffee shop serving breakfast and lunch into a lively brunch, dinner, and cocktail bar. Founded by hospitality-obsessed designer Virginia Brown, it's a dream realized: a welcoming space where community and creativity thrive.

By morning, guests enjoy thoughtfully crafted coffee, house-made brioche donuts, and fresh daily pastries. The kitchen, led by Executive Chef Rory Lee, serves a globally inspired, made-from-scratch menu with hearty brunches, fresh lunch options, and cozy, seasonal dinner specials. The beverage program blends single-origin coffees, natural wines, curated beers, and handcrafted cocktails--including playful nods to breakfast flavors and midnight musings.

Open all day, Midnight Morning transitions seamlessly between meals, inviting guests to linger over espresso in the morning, a spritz at golden hour, or a nightcap before close.

name: Nine
description:
At nine, we celebrate life's timeless pleasures by blending the rich tradition of European fine dining with world-class cuisine and exceptional libations sourced from across the globe. Nestled within the charm of Boston's historic Beacon Hill district--directly across from Boston Common--our restaurant offers an inviting and warm atmosphere, beautifully enhanced by the artistry of local creators we proudly call friends.

Chef de Cuisine Andrew Simonich crafts a seasonally driven tasting menu alongside a thoughtfully curated a la carte selection, allowing each guest to design their own culinary journey. We are also proud to introduce Boston's first gin palace, a modern homage to the lavishly decorated public houses of the 1830s, adding a unique and spirited dimension to your dining experience.

name: Dw French
description: MIDA by Chef Douglass William's is now open in the bustling Fenway neighborhood. This outpost of our James Beard Nominated restaurant group is situated just a few blocks from Fenway Park within close walking distance to several destinations including the Museum of Fine Arts, the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum, and the Beth Israel Medical Campus. Come enjoy staple dishes from our scratch kitchen such as Gnocchi Cacio e Pepe, New Haven-Style thin crust pizza, crispy Arancini, and much more. The restaurant features a contemporary but comfortable aesthetic that lends itself to any occasion from the perfect date night, a quick lunch, or large private events. Vaulted ceilings, sprawling windows, a gorgeous lighting profile, and a covered patio make this location the perfect Fenway escape. The restaurant also features a 15 seat bar that is open for walk-ins seven days a week. We are thrilled to be a part of this neighborhood and cannot wait to welcome you into our home. XOXO MIDA

description: Lucky Tiger Asian Bistro is Charlestown's newest and coolest addition to the emerging"Restaurant Row" in Hood Park located at 100 Hood Park Drive. Lucky Tiger joins the streetthat already includes neighborhood staple Tradesman Coffeeshop & Pizza Bar, thepowerhouse entertainment venue Urban Wild, and the seasonal festivals including WickedHaunt Fest and Winter Fest. "I can't believe how much there is to do here now! My friendsand I can park for free for 3 hours and just bounce around and experience so many differentbut cool concepts," said Rachael a visitor from Somerville.Lucky Tiger mixes a modern Asian hip vibe, funky cocktails, along with classic inspired dishesfrom many regions of Asia. We're not just feeding you, we're fueling your day with real, wholesome American classics that are good for the soul. Skip the grocery store hassle and let us cook for you. name: Equal Measure
description:
Helmed by ES Hospitality Bar Director Jackson Cannon and Bar Principal Eliza Hoar, Equal Measure is a contemporary bar that features highly innovative cocktails with an emphasis on seasonality and sustainability. Just down the hall from legendary neighborhood brasserie Eastern Standard, EM's highly curated back bar is stocked with world-class spirits, both rare and hand-selected.

Though the culinary-inspired cocktails feature unconventional ingredients, the balance and flavors that come through are designed to be as satisfying as any classic. Whether it's your first visit or you're a long-time caller, you'll be welcomed as a friend into the bar's warmth. This is a place for familiarity and discovery, for the adventurer and the traditionalist.

Reservations open 7 days out. We look forward to seeing you soon!

name: Yi Fang Taiwan Fruit Tea
description:
Escape the ordinary at Yi Fang Taiwan Fruit Tea in Boston, where authentic Taiwanese flavors await. Our menu features a variety of premium fruit teas made with the finest ingredients sourced from Taiwan.

We pride ourselves on using only natural ingredients, organic cane sugar, and fresh, seasonal fruits--no artificial flavors or powders. Discover unique flavors with our signature fruit teas, including traditional Chinese fruits like green plum and wintermelon.

Relax in our cozy ambiance, enhanced by soothing Chinese ballads and beautiful decor inspired by Sun Moon Lake tea.

Don't miss our must-try delights: the Yi Fang Signature Fruit Tea, a refreshing blend of Mountain tea, fresh fruit slices, and special passion fruit and pineapple sauces; the Brown Sugar Pearl Milk, a creamy treat with caramel tapioca pearls; the Brown Sugar Pearl Tea Latte, milk, and chewy pearls; and our seasonal fruit teas that showcase changing flavors. Come experience the taste of Taiwan!

name: Qiao Lin Hotpot
description:
Qiao Lin Hotpot is a renowned Chinese dining experience that blends rich culinary tradition with vibrant social interaction. Originating from Chongqing, China, Qiao Lin Hotpot has gained popularity worldwide for its bold flavors, customizable ingredients, and interactive cooking style. As a staple in Chinese cuisine, Qiao Lin Hotpot offers a unique way to enjoy a communal meal, making it a cultural and gastronomic treasure.
The origins of Qiao Lin Hotpot trace back to the bustling docks of Chongqing in the early 20th century. Workers in the area, seeking a hearty and affordable meal, created a cooking method that involved boiling meats and vegetables in a spicy, flavorful broth. Over time, this humble dish evolved into an elaborate dining experience, featuring a variety of ingredients and broth types that cater to different tastes. Qiao Lin Hotpot became famous for its rich, numbing, and aromatic broth, which incorporates Sichuan peppercorns and an array of fragrant spices.
